verses.ar: أَفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَمْ بِهِ جِنَّةٌ ۗ بَلِ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ فِي الْعَذَابِ وَالضَّلَالِ الْبَعِيدِ

verses.en: Have they not looked at what is ahead of them and what is behind them, of the sky and the earth? If We willed, We could make the ground cave in beneath them, or make pieces of the sky fall on them. In this is a sign for every devout worshiper.
verses.ar: أَفَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَىٰ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنْ نَشَأْ نَخْسِفْ بِهِمُ الْأَرْضَ أَوْ نُسْقِطْ عَلَيْهِمْ كِسَفًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُنِيبٍ

verses.en: We bestowed upon David favor from Us: “O mountains! Echo his hymns. And the birds.” And We softened iron for him.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا دَاوُودَ مِنَّا فَضْلًا ۖ يَا جِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُ وَالطَّيْرَ ۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ الْحَدِيدَ

verses.en: “Make coats of armor. And measure the links well. And work righteousness. I am Observant of everything you do.”
verses.ar: أَنِ اعْمَلْ سَابِغَاتٍ وَقَدِّرْ فِي السَّرْدِ ۖ وَاعْمَلُوا صَالِحًا ۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ

verses.en: And for Solomon, the wind—its outward journey was one month, and its return journey was one month. And We made a spring of tar flow for him. And there were sprites that worked of him, by the leave of his Lord. But whoever of them deviated from Our command, We made him taste of the punishment of the Inferno.
verses.ar: وَلِسُلَيْمَانَ الرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهْرٌ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهْرٌ ۖ وَأَسَلْنَا لَهُ عَيْنَ الْقِطْرِ ۖ وَمِنَ الْجِنِّ مَنْ يَعْمَلُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِ ۖ وَمَنْ يَزِغْ مِنْهُمْ عَنْ أَمْرِنَا نُذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ السَّعِيرِ

verses.en: They made for him whatever he desired: sanctuaries, statues, basins like reservoirs, and heavy cauldrons. “O House of David, work with appreciation,” but a few of My servants are thankful.
verses.ar: يَعْمَلُونَ لَهُ مَا يَشَاءُ مِنْ مَحَارِيبَ وَتَمَاثِيلَ وَجِفَانٍ كَالْجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٍ رَاسِيَاتٍ ۚ اعْمَلُوا آلَ دَاوُودَ شُكْرًا ۚ وَقَلِيلٌ مِنْ عِبَادِيَ الشَّكُورُ

verses.en: Then, when We decreed death for him, nothing indicated his death to them except an earthworm eating at his staff. And when he collapsed, it became clear to the sprites: that had they known the unseen, they would not have remained in the humiliating punishment.
verses.ar: فَلَمَّا قَضَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ الْمَوْتَ مَا دَلَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَوْتِهِ إِلَّا دَابَّةُ الْأَرْضِ تَأْكُلُ مِنْسَأَتَهُ ۖ فَلَمَّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ الْجِنُّ أَنْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ الْغَيْبَ مَا لَبِثُوا فِي الْعَذَابِ الْمُهِينِ

verses.en: In Sheba’s homeland, there was a sign for them: two gardens, on the right, and on the left. “Eat of your Lord’s provision, and give thanks to Him.” A good land, and a forgiving Lord.
verses.ar: لَقَدْ كَانَ لِسَبَإٍ فِي مَسْكَنِهِمْ آيَةٌ ۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَنْ يَمِينٍ وَشِمَالٍ ۖ كُلُوا مِنْ رِزْقِ رَبِّكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لَهُ ۚ بَلْدَةٌ طَيِّبَةٌ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٌ

verses.en: But they turned away. So We unleashed against them the flood of the dam, and We substituted their two gardens with two gardens of bitter fruits, fruitless bushes, and a few thorny shrubs.
verses.ar: فَأَعْرَضُوا فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْلَ الْعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلْنَاهُمْ بِجَنَّتَيْهِمْ جَنَّتَيْنِ ذَوَاتَيْ أُكُلٍ خَمْطٍ وَأَثْلٍ وَشَيْءٍ مِنْ سِدْرٍ قَلِيلٍ

verses.en: We thus penalized them for their ingratitude. Would We penalize any except the ungrateful?
verses.ar: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَاهُمْ بِمَا كَفَرُوا ۖ وَهَلْ نُجَازِي إِلَّا الْكَفُورَ

verses.en: And We placed between them and the towns that We blessed prominent towns, and We made the travel between them easy. “Travel between them by night and day, safely.”
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ الْقُرَى الَّتِي بَارَكْنَا فِيهَا قُرًى ظَاهِرَةً وَقَدَّرْنَا فِيهَا السَّيْرَ ۖ سِيرُوا فِيهَا لَيَالِيَ وَأَيَّامًا آمِنِينَ

verses.en: But they said, “Our Lord, lengthen the distances of our journeys.” They wronged themselves. So We made them history, and We scattered them in every direction. In this are lessons for every patient, appreciative person.
verses.ar: فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا بَاعِدْ بَيْنَ أَسْفَارِنَا وَظَلَمُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ فَجَعَلْنَاهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّقْنَاهُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ

verses.en: Iblis was correct in his assessment of them. They followed him, except for a group among the believers.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ صَدَّقَ عَلَيْهِمْ إِبْلِيسُ ظَنَّهُ فَاتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقًا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: He has no authority over them. But We wanted to know who believes in the Hereafter, and who is in doubt about it. Your Lord is Guardian over all things.
verses.ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُ عَلَيْهِمْ مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَنْ يُؤْمِنُ بِالْآخِرَةِ مِمَّنْ هُوَ مِنْهَا فِي شَكٍّ ۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ حَفِيظٌ

verses.en: Say, “Call upon those you claim besides Allah. They do not possess an atom's weight in the heavens or the earth, nor do they possess any partnership in them. And He has no backers from among them.”
verses.ar: قُلِ ادْعُوا الَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِيهِمَا مِنْ شِرْكٍ وَمَا لَهُ مِنْهُمْ مِنْ ظَهِيرٍ

verses.en: Intercession with Him is of no benefit, except for someone He has permitted. Until, when fear has subsided from their hearts, they will say, “What did your Lord say?” They will say, “The truth, and He is the High, the Great.”
verses.ar: وَلَا تَنْفَعُ الشَّفَاعَةُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا لِمَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ۚ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَنْ قُلُوبِهِمْ قَالُوا مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا الْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْكَبِيرُ

verses.en: Say, “Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?” Say, “Allah. And either you, or we, are upon guidance, or in evident error.”
verses.ar: قُلْ مَنْ يَرْزُقُكُمْ مِنَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ قُلِ اللَّهُ ۖ وَإِنَّا أَوْ إِيَّاكُمْ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوْ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ

verses.en: Say, “You will not be asked about our misdeeds, nor will we be asked about what you do.”
verses.ar: قُلْ لَا تُسْأَلُونَ عَمَّا أَجْرَمْنَا وَلَا نُسْأَلُ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: Say, “Our Lord will bring us together. Then He will judge between us equitably. He is the All-Knowing Arbiter.”
verses.ar: قُلْ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفْتَحُ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَهُوَ الْفَتَّاحُ الْعَلِيمُ

verses.en: Say, “Show me those you have attached to Him as associates. No indeed! In fact, He is Allah, the Powerful and the Wise.”
verses.ar: قُلْ أَرُونِيَ الَّذِينَ أَلْحَقْتُمْ بِهِ شُرَكَاءَ ۖ كَلَّا ۚ بَلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ

verses.en: We did not send you, except as a deliverer of good news and a warner—to all of humanity. But most people do not know.
verses.ar: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا كَافَّةً لِلنَّاسِ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: And they say, “When will this promise come true—if you are truthful?”
verses.ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ

verses.en: Say, “You have an appointment for a Day which you cannot postpone by one hour, nor bring forward.”
verses.ar: قُلْ لَكُمْ مِيعَادُ يَوْمٍ لَا تَسْتَأْخِرُونَ عَنْهُ سَاعَةً وَلَا تَسْتَقْدِمُونَ

verses.en: Those who disbelieve say, “We will never believe in this Quran, nor in what came before it.” If only you could see the wrongdoers, captive before their Lord, throwing back allegations at one another. Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, “Were it not for you, we would have been believers.”
verses.ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَنْ نُؤْمِنَ بِهَٰذَا الْقُرْآنِ وَلَا بِالَّذِي بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذِ الظَّالِمُونَ مَوْقُوفُونَ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ يَرْجِعُ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ الْقَوْلَ يَقُولُ الَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا لَوْلَا أَنْتُمْ لَكُنَّا مُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, “Was it us who turned you away from guidance when it came to you? No indeed, you yourselves were guilty.”
verses.ar: قَالَ الَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا أَنَحْنُ صَدَدْنَاكُمْ عَنِ الْهُدَىٰ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَاءَكُمْ ۖ بَلْ كُنْتُمْ مُجْرِمِينَ

verses.en: And those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, “It was your scheming by night and by day, ordering us to reject Allah, and to set up rivals to Him.” But they will hide their remorse when they see the punishment. We will put yokes around the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be repaid except for what they used to do?
verses.ar: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا لِلَّذِينَ اسْتَكْبَرُوا بَلْ مَكْرُ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ إِذْ تَأْمُرُونَنَا أَنْ نَكْفُرَ بِاللَّهِ وَنَجْعَلَ لَهُ أَنْدَادًا ۚ وَأَسَرُّوا النَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا الْعَذَابَ وَجَعَلْنَا الْأَغْلَالَ فِي أَعْنَاقِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ هَلْ يُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: We sent no warner to any town without its affluent saying, “We reject what you are sent with.”
verses.ar: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا فِي قَرْيَةٍ مِنْ نَذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَا إِنَّا بِمَا أُرْسِلْتُمْ بِهِ كَافِرُونَ

verses.en: And they say, “We have more wealth and children, and we will not be punished.”
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا نَحْنُ أَكْثَرُ أَمْوَالًا وَأَوْلَادًا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

verses.en: Say, “My Lord spreads out His bounty to whom He wills, or restricts it. But most people do not know.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَقْدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: It is neither your wealth nor your children that bring you closer to Us, but those who believe and work righteousness—these will have a double reward for what they did, and they will be secure in lofty chambers.
verses.ar: وَمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَلَا أَوْلَادُكُمْ بِالَّتِي تُقَرِّبُكُمْ عِنْدَنَا زُلْفَىٰ إِلَّا مَنْ آمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَأُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ جَزَاءُ الضِّعْفِ بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَهُمْ فِي الْغُرُفَاتِ آمِنُونَ

verses.en: As for those who endeavor to undermine Our revelations—these will be summoned to the punishment.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِينَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِي آيَاتِنَا مُعَاجِزِينَ أُولَٰئِكَ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: Say, “My Lord gives abundantly to whom He wills of His servants—or withholds it. Whatever you spend, He will replace it; and He is the Best of providers.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُ ۚ وَمَا أَنْفَقْتُمْ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الرَّازِقِينَ

verses.en: On the Day when He gathers them all together, then say to the angels, “Was it you these used to worship?”
verses.ar: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ أَهَٰؤُلَاءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ

verses.en: They will say, “Be You glorified; You are our Master, not them. In fact, they used to worship the jinn, and most of them had faith in them.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ أَنْتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِنْ دُونِهِمْ ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ الْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُمْ بِهِمْ مُؤْمِنُونَ

verses.en: “So today, none of you has the power to benefit or harm the other.” And We will say to those who did wrong, “Taste the agony of the Fire, which you used to deny.”
verses.ar: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذُوقُوا عَذَابَ النَّارِ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

verses.en: And when Our enlightening Verses are recited to them, they say, “This is nothing but a man who wants to prevent you from what your ancestors worshiped.” And they say, “This is nothing but a fabricated lie.” And those who disbelieve say of the Truth when it has come to them, “This is nothing but plain magic.”
verses.ar: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتُنَا بَيِّنَاتٍ قَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَنْ يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا مَا هَٰذَا إِلَّا إِفْكٌ مُفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: Although We had never given them any scriptures to study, nor did We ever send them a warner before you.
verses.ar: وَمَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ مِنْ كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِنْ نَذِيرٍ

verses.en: Those before them also denied. And they have not attained even one-tenth of what We had given them. They denied My messengers, so how was My rejection?
verses.ar: وَكَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا مِعْشَارَ مَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا رُسُلِي ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

verses.en: Say, “I offer you a single advice: devote yourselves to Allah, in pairs, or individually. Then think. Your friend is not crazy. He is just a warner to you, before the advent of severe punishment.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَعِظُكُمْ بِوَاحِدَةٍ ۖ أَنْ تَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَادَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُمْ مِنْ جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَكُمْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ

verses.en: Say, “Had I ever asked you for a reward, it is yours. My reward is only from Allah, and He is Witness over all things.”
verses.ar: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُمْ مِنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

verses.en: Say, “My Lord projects the truth, Knower of the Unseen.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقْذِفُ بِالْحَقِّ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ

verses.en: Say, “The Truth has come; while falsehood can neither originate, nor regenerate.”
verses.ar: قُلْ جَاءَ الْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ الْبَاطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

verses.en: Say, “If I go astray, I go astray only to my own loss. And if I am guided, it is through what my Lord inspires me. He is Hearing and Near.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنْ ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَا أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِي ۖ وَإِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِي إِلَيَّ رَبِّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ

verses.en: And if only you could see, when they will be horrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a nearby place.
verses.ar: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذْ فَزِعُوا فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا مِنْ مَكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ

verses.en: And they say, “We have believed in it.” But how can they attain it from a distant place?
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا آمَنَّا بِهِ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَاوُشُ مِنْ مَكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ

verses.en: They have disbelieved it in the past. And they made allegations from a distant place.
verses.ar: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ مِنْ مَكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ

verses.en: And a barrier will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their counterparts before. They are confounded by doubt.
verses.ar: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِمْ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا فِي شَكٍّ مُرِيبٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Praise be to Allah, Programmer of the heavens and the earth, Maker of the angels: messengers with wings—double, triple, and quadruple. He adds to creation as He wills. Allah is Capable of everything.
verses.ar: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولِي أَجْنِحَةٍ مَثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ ۚ يَزِيدُ فِي الْخَلْقِ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

verses.en: Whatever mercy Allah unfolds for the people, none can withhold it. And whatsoever He withholds, none can release it thereafter. He is the Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
verses.ar: مَا يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِنْ رَحْمَةٍ فَلَا مُمْسِكَ لَهَا ۖ وَمَا يُمْسِكْ فَلَا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ

verses.en: O, people! Remember Allah’s Blessing upon you. Is there a creator other than Allah who provides for you from heaven and earth? There is no god except He. So how do you deviate?
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ هَلْ مِنْ خَالِقٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ يَرْزُقُكُمْ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ

verses.en: If they reject you: messengers before you were rejected. To Allah, all matters are returned.
verses.ar: وَإِنْ يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ

verses.en: O, people! The promise of Allah is true. So let not the lowly life seduce you, nor let the Deceiver deceive you regarding Allah.
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُمْ بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ

verses.en: Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy. He only calls his gang to be among the inmates of the Inferno.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّمَا يَدْعُو حِزْبَهُ لِيَكُونُوا مِنْ أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ

verses.en: Those who disbelieve will suffer a harsh punishment, but those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and a great reward.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ مَغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ

verses.en: What of him whose evil deed was made attractive to him, and so he regards it as good? Allah leads astray whom He wills, and He guides whom He wills. So do not waste yourself sorrowing over them. Allah knows what they do.
verses.ar: أَفَمَنْ زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۖ فَلَا تَذْهَبْ نَفْسُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسَرَاتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ

verses.en: Allah is He who sends the winds, which agitate clouds, which We drive to a dead land, and thereby revive the ground after it had died. Likewise is the Resurrection.
verses.ar: وَاللَّهُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابًا فَسُقْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ مَيِّتٍ فَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ النُّشُورُ

verses.en: Whoever desires honor—all honor belongs to Allah. To Him ascends speech that is pure, and He elevates righteous conduct. But as for those who plot evil, a terrible punishment awaits them, and the planning of these will fail.
verses.ar: مَنْ كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ

verses.en: Allah created you from dust, then from a small drop, then He made you pairs. No female conceives, or delivers, except with His knowledge. And no living thing advances in years, or its life is shortened, but is in a Record. That is certainly easy for Allah.
verses.ar: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ مِنْ تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنْثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِنْ مُعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنْقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ

verses.en: The two bodies of water are not alike: one is fresh, palatable, and pleasant to drink, while the other is salty and bitter. Yet from each, you eat tender meat, and you extract ornaments that you wear. And you see the ships plowing through them, so that you may seek of His bounty, and so that you may give thanks.
verses.ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِنْ كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِنْ فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ

verses.en: He merges the night into the day, and He merges the day into the night. And He regulated the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. As for those you invoke besides Him: they do not possess a speck.
verses.ar: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْ قِطْمِيرٍ

verses.en: If you pray to them, they cannot hear your prayer. And if they were to hear, they could not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will reject your partnership. None can inform you like the Expert.
verses.ar: إِنْ تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ

verses.en: O, people! It is you who stand in need of Allah; while Allah is the Rich, the Praiseworthy.
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنْتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ

verses.en: If He wills, He can do away with you, and produce a new creation.
verses.ar: إِنْ يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ

verses.en: And that is not difficult for Allah.
verses.ar: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ

verses.en: No burdened soul can bear the burdens of another. Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, none of it will be lifted, even by a close relative. You are to warn those who fear their Lord inwardly and perform the prayer. Whoever purifies himself, purifies himself for his own good. To Allah is the final return.
verses.ar: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِنْ تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ

verses.en: Not equal are the blind and the seeing.
verses.ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ

verses.en: Nor are darkness and light.
verses.ar: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ

verses.en: Nor are shade and torrid heat.
verses.ar: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ

verses.en: Nor are equal the living and the dead. Allah makes whom He will hear, but you cannot make those in the graves hear.
verses.ar: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنْتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَنْ فِي الْقُبُورِ

verses.en: You are only a warner.
verses.ar: إِنْ أَنْتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ

verses.en: We sent you with the truth: a deliverer of good news, and a warner. There is no community, but a warner has passed through it.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِنْ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ

verses.en: If they deny you, those before them also denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs, divine Books, and the Enlightening Scripture.
verses.ar: وَإِنْ يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ

verses.en: Then I seized those who disbelieved—so how was My rejection?
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

verses.en: Have you not considered that Allah sends down water from the sky? With it, We produce fruits of diverse colors. And in the mountains are streaks of white and red—of diverse hues—and pitch-black.
verses.ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ

verses.en: Likewise: human beings, animals, and livestock are of various colors. From among His worshipers, the learned fear Allah. Allah is Almighty, Oft-Forgiving.
verses.ar: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ

verses.en: Those who read Allah’s book, and perform the prayer, and donate from what We have provided for them—secretly and publicly—expect a trade that will not fail.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنْفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَنْ تَبُورَ

verses.en: So that He may pay them their dues in full, and increase them from His grace. He is Forgiving, Most Appreciative.
verses.ar: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُمْ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ

verses.en: What We inspired in you, of the Book, is the truth—confirming what came before it. Allah is Well-Informed of His worshipers, All-Seeing.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ

verses.en: Then We passed the Book to those of Our servants whom We selected. Some of them wrong their souls, and some follow a middle course, and some are foremost in good deeds, by Allah’s leave—that is the greatest favor.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُمْ مُقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ

verses.en: The Gardens of Eden, which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their clothing therein will be silk.
verses.ar: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ

verses.en: And they will say, “Praise be to Allah, Who has lifted all sorrow from us. Our Lord is Most Forgiving, Most Appreciative.
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ

verses.en: He Who settled us in the Home of Permanence, by His grace: where boredom will not touch us, and fatigue will not afflict us.”
verses.ar: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ

verses.en: As for those who disbelieve: for them is the Fire of Hell, where they will never be finished off and die, nor will its punishment be reduced for them. Thus We repay every disbeliever.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ

verses.en: And they will scream in it, “Our Lord, let us out, and we will act righteously, differently from the way we used to act.” Did We not give you a life long enough, in which anyone who wanted to understand would have understood? And the warner did come to you. So taste. The wrongdoers have no helper.
verses.ar: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُمْ مَا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَنْ تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِنْ نَصِيرٍ

verses.en: Allah is the Knower of the future of the heavens and the earth. He knows what the hearts contain.
verses.ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ

verses.en: It is He Who made you successors on earth. Whoever disbelieves, his disbelief will recoil upon him. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their Lord's disfavor of them. The disbelief of the disbelievers adds only to their loss.
verses.ar: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَنْ كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

verses.en: Say, “Have you considered those partners of yours that you call upon instead of Allah? Show me what they have created on earth. Or do they have a partnership in the heavens?” Or did we give them a book whose clear teachings they follow? In fact, the wrongdoers promise one another nothing but delusion.
verses.ar: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِنْ يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُمْ بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا

verses.en: Allah keeps the heavens and the earth from falling apart. And were they to fall apart, there is none to hold them together except He. He is Clement, Forgiving.
verses.ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَنْ تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِنْ زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا

verses.en: And they swore by Allah, with their most solemn oaths, that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than any of the communities. Yet when a warner came to them, it only increased them in aversion.
verses.ar: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِنْ جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا

verses.en: Priding themselves on earth, and scheming evil. But evil scheming overwhelms none but its authors. Do they expect anything but the precedent of those of old? You will find no change in Allah’s practice, and you will find no deviation from Allah’s practice.
verses.ar: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا

verses.en: Have they not journeyed on earth, and observed the fate of those before them? They were far superior to them in might. And nothing in the heavens or on earth can thwart Allah. He is Knowledgeable and Capable.
verses.ar: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنْظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا

verses.en: If Allah were to punish people for what they have earned, He would not leave a single creature on its surface. But He postpones them until a stated time. Then, when their time has arrived—Allah is Observant of His servants.
verses.ar: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِنْ دَابَّةٍ وَلَٰكِنْ يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Ya. Seen.
verses.ar: يس

verses.en: By the Wise Quran.
verses.ar: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ

verses.en: You are one of the messengers.
verses.ar: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: On a straight path.
verses.ar: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ

verses.en: The revelation of the Almighty, the Merciful.
verses.ar: تَنْزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: To warn a people whose ancestors were not warned, so they are unaware.
verses.ar: لِتُنْذِرَ قَوْمًا مَا أُنْذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ

verses.en: The word has been justified against most of them—for they do not believe.
verses.ar: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

verses.en: We placed shackles upon their necks, up to their chins, so they are forced up.
verses.ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُمْ مُقْمَحُونَ

verses.en: And We placed a barrier in front of them, and a barrier behind them, and We enshrouded them; so they cannot see.
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ

verses.en: And it is the same for them, whether you warn them, or do not warn them—they will not believe.
verses.ar: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

verses.en: You only warn whoever follows the Message and fears the Compassionate unseen. So give him the good news of forgiveness and a generous reward.
verses.ar: إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ

verses.en: It is We who give life to the dead. And We write what they have forwarded, and their traces. We keep track of all things in a Clear Registry.
verses.ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ

verses.en: And give them the example of the inhabitants of the town, when the messengers came to it.
verses.ar: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُمْ مَثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ

verses.en: We sent to them two messengers, but they denied both, so We reinforced them with a third. They said, “We are sent to you.”
verses.ar: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ مُرْسَلُونَ

verses.en: They said, “You are only humans like us, and the Compassionate did not reveal anything. You are only lying.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا مَا أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنْزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ

verses.en: They said, “Our Lord knows that we are sent to you.
verses.ar: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ

verses.en: And our only duty is clear delivery.”
verses.ar: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ

verses.en: They said, “We see a bad omen in you. If you do not give up, we will stone you, and a painful punishment from us will befall you.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِنْ لَمْ تَنْتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُمْ مِنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

verses.en: They said, “Your bad omen is within yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? In fact, you are excessive people.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُمْ مَعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِنْ ذُكِّرْتُمْ ۚ بَلْ أَنْتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُسْرِفُونَ

verses.en: And a man came running from the outskirts of the city. He said, “O my people, follow the messengers.
verses.ar: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: Follow those who ask of you no payment—and are themselves guided.
verses.ar: اتَّبِعُوا مَنْ لَا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُمْ مُهْتَدُونَ

verses.en: “And why should I not worship Him Who originated me, and to Whom you will be returned?
verses.ar: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

verses.en: Shall I take gods apart from Him? If the Beneficent intends harm for me, their intercession would not avail me at all, nor would they save me.
verses.ar: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِنْ دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِنْ يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنْقِذُونِ

verses.en: In that case, I would be completely lost.
verses.ar: إِنِّي إِذًا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ

verses.en: I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me.”
verses.ar: إِنِّي آمَنْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ

verses.en: It was said, “Enter Paradise.” He said, “If only my people knew.
verses.ar: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: How my Lord has forgiven me, and made me of the honored.”
verses.ar: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ

verses.en: After him, We sent down no hosts from heaven against his people, nor would We send down.
verses.ar: وَمَا أَنْزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ مِنْ جُنْدٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنْزِلِينَ

verses.en: It was just a single Shout, and they were extinguished.
verses.ar: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ

verses.en: Alas for the servants! Never did a messenger come to them, but they ridiculed him.
verses.ar: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ رَسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ

verses.en: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them? How none of them returned to them?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

verses.en: All of them, every single one of them, will be summoned before Us.
verses.ar: وَإِنْ كُلٌّ لَمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: And there is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, and We produce from it grains from which they eat.
verses.ar: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ

verses.en: And We placed in it gardens of date-palms and grapevines, and We caused springs to gush out of it.
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِنْ نَخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ

verses.en: So that they may eat of its fruit—although their hands did not make it. Will they not be thankful?
verses.ar: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِنْ ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

verses.en: Glory be to He, who created all the pairs, of whatever the earth grows, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.
verses.ar: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنْبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنْفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: Another sign for them is the night: We strip the day from it—and they are in darkness.
verses.ar: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُمْ مُظْلِمُونَ

verses.en: And the sun runs its course towards its destined point. That is the design of the Almighty, the All-Knowing.
verses.ar: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ

verses.en: And the moon: We have disposed it in phases—until it returns like the old twig.
verses.ar: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ

verses.en: The sun is not to overtake the moon, nor is the night to outpace the day. Each glides in an orbit.
verses.ar: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنْبَغِي لَهَا أَنْ تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ

verses.en: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors in the loaded Ark.
verses.ar: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ

verses.en: And We created for them the like of it, in which they ride.
verses.ar: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِنْ مِثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ

verses.en: If We willed, We could drown them—with no screaming to be heard from them, nor will they be saved.
verses.ar: وَإِنْ نَشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْقَذُونَ

verses.en: Except by mercy from Us, and enjoyment for a while.
verses.ar: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

verses.en: Yet when it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you, and what is behind you, so you may receive mercy .”
verses.ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

verses.en: Never came to them a sign of their Lord’s signs, but they turned away from it.
verses.ar: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ آيَةٍ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ

verses.en: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,” those who disbelieve say to those who believe, “Should we feed someone whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray.”
verses.ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنْفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَنْ لَوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ

verses.en: And they say, “When will this promise come about—if you are truthful?”
verses.ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ

verses.en: All they can expect is a single blast, which will seize them while they feud.
verses.ar: مَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ

verses.en: They will be unable to make a will. And they will not return to their families.
verses.ar: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

verses.en: And the Trumpet will be blown: and at once, they will rush from the graves to their Lord.
verses.ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُمْ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنْسِلُونَ

verses.en: They will say, “Woe to us! Who resurrected us from our resting-place?” This is what the Mercy-Giver had promised; the messengers have told the truth.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَنْ بَعَثَنَا مِنْ مَرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ

verses.en: It will be but a single Scream: and at once, they will all be arraigned before Us.
verses.ar: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: On that Day, no soul will be wronged in the least, and you will be rewarded only for what you used to do.
verses.ar: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: The inhabitants of Paradise, on that Day, will be happily engaged.
verses.ar: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ

verses.en: They and their spouses, in shades, reclining on couches.
verses.ar: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ

verses.en: There they will have fruits. They will have whatever they ask for.
verses.ar: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُمْ مَا يَدَّعُونَ

verses.en: Peace—a saying from a Most Merciful Lord.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِنْ رَبٍّ رَحِيمٍ

verses.en: But step aside today, you criminals.
verses.ar: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ

verses.en: Did I not covenant with you, O Children of Adam, that you shall not worship Satan? That he is your sworn enemy?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَنْ لَا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: And that you shall worship Me? This is a straight path.
verses.ar: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُسْتَقِيمٌ

verses.en: He has misled great multitudes of you. Did you not reason?
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنْكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ

verses.en: This is Gehenna that you were promised.
verses.ar: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ

verses.en: Roast in it today, for having disbelieved.
verses.ar: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ

verses.en: On that Day, We will seal their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to earn.
verses.ar: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ

verses.en: And had We willed, We would have blotted out their eyes. Then they would race to the path; yet how would they see?
verses.ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ

verses.en: And had We willed, We would have transformed them in their place. Then they could neither advance, nor go back.
verses.ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ

verses.en: Whomever We give long life, We decline his development. Do they not understand?
verses.ar: وَمَنْ نُعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ

verses.en: We did not teach him poetry, nor is it suitable for him. It is only a reminder and a Clear Quran.
verses.ar: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنْبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: To warn whoever is alive, and to prove the Word against the faithless.
verses.ar: لِيُنْذِرَ مَنْ كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ

verses.en: Have they not considered that We created for them, of Our Handiwork, livestock that they own?
verses.ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ

verses.en: And We subdued them for them. Some of them they ride, and some they eat.
verses.ar: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ

verses.en: And they have in them other benefits—and beverages. Will they not give thanks?
verses.ar: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

verses.en: Yet they have taken to themselves gods other than Allah, that perhaps they may be helped.
verses.ar: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَعَلَّهُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ

verses.en: They cannot help them, although they are arrayed as troops for them.
verses.ar: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُنْدٌ مُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: So do not let their words sadden you. We know what they conceal, and what they disclose.
verses.ar: فَلَا يَحْزُنْكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

verses.en: Does the human being not consider that We created him from a drop? Yet he becomes a fierce adversary.
verses.ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: And he produces arguments against Us, and he forgets his own creation. He says, “Who will revive the bones when they have decayed?”
verses.ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَنْ يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ

verses.en: Say, “He who initiated them in the first instance will revive them. And He knows every creation.”
verses.ar: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنْشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

verses.en: He who produced for you fuel from the green trees, with which you kindle fire.
verses.ar: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنْتُمْ مِنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ

verses.en: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Certainly. He is the All-Knowing Creator.
verses.ar: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ

verses.en: His command, when He wills something, is to say to it, “Be,” and it comes to be.
verses.ar: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَنْ يَقُولَ لَهُ كُنْ فَيَكُونُ

verses.en: So glory be to Him, in whose hand is the dominion of all things, and to Him, you will be returned.
verses.ar: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the aligners aligning.
verses.ar: وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا

verses.en: And the drivers driving.
verses.ar: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا

verses.en: And the reciters of the Reminder.
verses.ar: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا

verses.en: Your God is certainly One.
verses.ar: إِنَّ إِلَٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ

verses.en: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and everything between them, and Lord of the Easts.
verses.ar: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ

verses.en: We have decorated the lower heaven with the beauty of the planets.
verses.ar: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ

verses.en: And protection from every defiant devil.
verses.ar: وَحِفْظًا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَارِدٍ

verses.en: They cannot eavesdrop on the Supernal Elite, for they get bombarded from every side.
verses.ar: لَا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِنْ كُلِّ جَانِبٍ

verses.en: Repelled—they will have a lingering torment.
verses.ar: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ

verses.en: Except for him who snatches a glimpse—he will be pursued by a piercing flare.
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ

verses.en: Inquire of them, “Are they more difficult to create, or those We created?” We created them from sticky clay.
verses.ar: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمْ مَنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُمْ مِنْ طِينٍ لَازِبٍ

verses.en: But you wonder, and they ridicule.
verses.ar: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ

verses.en: And when reminded, they pay no attention.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ

verses.en: And when they see a sign, they ridicule.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ

verses.en: And they say, “This is nothing but obvious magic.
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we to be resurrected?
verses.ar: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

verses.en: And our ancestors of old?”
verses.ar: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ

verses.en: Say, “Yes indeed, and you will be subdued.”
verses.ar: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنْتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ

verses.en: It will be a single nudge, and they will be staring.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنْظُرُونَ

verses.en: And they will say, “Woe to us, this is Judgement Day.”
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ

verses.en: “This is the Day of Separation that you used to deny.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ

verses.en: Gather those who did wrong, and their types, and what they used to worship.
verses.ar: احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ

verses.en: Besides Allah, and lead them to the path of Hell.
verses.ar: مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: And stop them. They are to be questioned.”
verses.ar: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ مَسْئُولُونَ

verses.en: What is the matter with you? Why do you not help one another?
verses.ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ

verses.en: In fact, on that Day, they will be submissive.
verses.ar: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ

verses.en: They will turn to one another, questioning one another.
verses.ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ

verses.en: They will say, “You used to approach us from the right.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ

verses.en: They will say, “You yourselves were not believers.
verses.ar: قَالُوا بَلْ لَمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: We had no authority over you. You yourselves were oppressive people.
verses.ar: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنْتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ

verses.en: So the Word of our Lord is justified against us. We are tasting it.
verses.ar: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ

verses.en: We seduced you. We were seducers.”
verses.ar: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ

verses.en: On that Day, they will share in the punishment.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ

verses.en: Thus We deal with the guilty.
verses.ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ

verses.en: When it was said to them, “There is no god except Allah,” they became arrogant.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

verses.en: And said, “Are we to give up our gods for a mad poet?”
verses.ar: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَجْنُونٍ

verses.en: In fact, he came with the truth, and he confirmed the messengers.
verses.ar: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: Most certainly, you will taste the painful punishment.
verses.ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ

verses.en: And you will be repaid only for what you used to do.
verses.ar: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: Not so for Allah’s chosen worshipers.
verses.ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ

verses.en: For them is a known provision.
verses.ar: أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَعْلُومٌ

verses.en: Fruits—and they will be honored.
verses.ar: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُمْ مُكْرَمُونَ

verses.en: In the Gardens of Bliss.
verses.ar: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ

verses.en: On furnishings, facing one another.
verses.ar: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُتَقَابِلِينَ

verses.en: A cup from a flowing spring will be circulated among them.
verses.ar: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِكَأْسٍ مِنْ مَعِينٍ

verses.en: White and delicious to the drinkers.
verses.ar: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِلشَّارِبِينَ

verses.en: Never polluted—and never intoxicating.
verses.ar: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنْزَفُونَ

verses.en: With them will be maidens of modest gaze with lustrous eyes.
verses.ar: وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ

verses.en: As if they were guarded pearls.
verses.ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَكْنُونٌ

verses.en: And they will approach one another, questioning.
verses.ar: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ

verses.en: One of them will say, “I used to have a close friend.
verses.ar: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ

verses.en: Who used to say, “Are you among those who believe?
verses.ar: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ

verses.en: That after we die and become dust and bones, we will be called to account?”
verses.ar: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

verses.en: He will say, “Will you have a look?”
verses.ar: قَالَ هَلْ أَنْتُمْ مُطَّلِعُونَ

verses.en: So he will look, and He will see him in the midst of Hellfire.
verses.ar: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: He will say, “By Allah, you almost ruined me.
verses.ar: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِنْ كِدْتَ لَتُرْدِينِ

verses.en: Were it not for my Lord’s favor, I would have been among the arraigned.”
verses.ar: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنْتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ

verses.en: “We will not die.
verses.ar: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ

verses.en: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished.”
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

verses.en: This is the great victory.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ

verses.en: For the like of this let the workers work.
verses.ar: لِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ

verses.en: Is this a better hospitality, or the Tree of Bitterness?
verses.ar: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ

verses.en: We made it an ordeal for the unjust.
verses.ar: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِلظَّالِمِينَ

verses.en: It is a tree that grows from the depths of Hellfire.
verses.ar: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: Its sprouts are like the devils’ heads.
verses.ar: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ

verses.en: They will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ

verses.en: Then, on top of it, they will have a boiling brew.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِنْ حَمِيمٍ

verses.en: Then their return will be to the Blaze.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: They had found their parents astray.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ

verses.en: And they rushed along in their footsteps.
verses.ar: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ

verses.en: And most of the ancients before them went astray.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: Although We had sent warners among them.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ مُنْذِرِينَ

verses.en: So observe the final fate of those who were warned.
verses.ar: فَانْظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ

verses.en: Not so for Allah’s devoted servants.
verses.ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ

verses.en: And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ

verses.en: And We saved him and his family from the great calamity.
verses.ar: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ

verses.en: And We made his descendants the survivors.
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ

verses.en: And We left mention of him among later generations.
verses.ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ

verses.en: Peace be upon Noah, among all people.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: Thus We reward the good-doers.
verses.ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: He was one of Our believing servants.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: Then We drowned the others.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ

verses.en: And of his kind was Abraham.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ مِنْ شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ

verses.en: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart.
verses.ar: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

verses.en: When he said to his father and his people, “What are you worshiping?
verses.ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ

verses.en: Is it falsified gods, instead of Allah, that you want?
verses.ar: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ

verses.en: What is your opinion about the Lord of the Worlds?”
verses.ar: فَمَا ظَنُّكُمْ بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: Then he took a glance at the stars.
verses.ar: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ

verses.en: And said, “I am sick.”
verses.ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ

verses.en: But they turned their backs on him, and went away.
verses.ar: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ

verses.en: Then he turned to their gods, and said, “Will you not eat?
verses.ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

verses.en: What is wrong with you, that you do not speak?”
verses.ar: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنْطِقُونَ

verses.en: Then he turned on them, striking with the right hand.
verses.ar: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ

verses.en: And they came to him rushing.
verses.ar: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ

verses.en: He said, “Do you worship what you carve?
verses.ar: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ

verses.en: When it is Allah Who created you, and what you manufacture?”
verses.ar: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: They said, “Construct a pyre for him, and throw him into the furnace.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: They desired to scheme against him, so We made them the lowest.
verses.ar: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ

verses.en: And he said, “I am going to my Lord—He will guide me.”
verses.ar: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ

verses.en: “My Lord, grant me one of the righteous.”
verses.ar: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ

verses.en: So We gave him the good news of a gentle boy.
verses.ar: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ

verses.en: Then, when he became old enough to work with him, he said, “O My son, I see in a dream that I am slaughtering you; so see what you think.” He said, “O my father, do as you are commanded; you will find me, Allah willing, patient.”
verses.ar: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانْظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ

verses.en: Then, when they submitted, and he put his forehead down.
verses.ar: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ

verses.en: We called to him, “O Abraham!
verses.ar: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَنْ يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ

verses.en: You have fulfilled the vision.” Thus We reward the doers of good.
verses.ar: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: That was clearly an obvious test.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ

verses.en: And We redeemed him with a great sacrifice.
verses.ar: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ

verses.en: And We left with him for later generations.
verses.ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ

verses.en: Peace be upon Abraham.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ

verses.en: Thus We reward the good-doers.
verses.ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: He was one of Our believing servants.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: And We gave him the good news of Isaac, a prophet from the righteous.
verses.ar: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ

verses.en: And We blessed him, and Isaac. And among their descendants are good-doers. And others who clearly wrong themselves.
verses.ar: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: And We have favored Moses and Aaron.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ

verses.en: And We saved them and their people from the terrible disaster.
verses.ar: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ

verses.en: And We supported them, so they became the victors.
verses.ar: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ

verses.en: And We gave them the Clarifying Scripture.
verses.ar: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ

verses.en: And We guided them on the straight path.
verses.ar: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ

verses.en: And We left with them for later generations.
verses.ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ

verses.en: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ

verses.en: Thus We reward the righteous.
verses.ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: They were of Our believing servants.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: Also, Elijah was one of the messengers.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: He said to his people, “Do you not fear?
verses.ar: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

verses.en: Do you call on Baal, and forsake the Best of creators?
verses.ar: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ

verses.en: Allah is your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers.”
verses.ar: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: But they called him a liar, so they will be brought.
verses.ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: Not so for Allah’s chosen servants.
verses.ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ

verses.en: And We left with him for later generations.
verses.ar: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ

verses.en: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ

verses.en: Thus We reward the virtuous.
verses.ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: He was one of Our faithful servants.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verses.en: And Lot was one of the messengers.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: When We saved him and his family, all together.
verses.ar: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ

verses.en: Except for an old woman, who was among the laggards.
verses.ar: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ

verses.en: Then We annihilated the others.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ

verses.en: You pass by them in the morning.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِمْ مُصْبِحِينَ

verses.en: And at night. Will you not understand?
verses.ar: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

verses.en: And Jonah was one of the messengers.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: When he fled to the overloaded ship.
verses.ar: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ

verses.en: He gambled and lost.
verses.ar: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ

verses.en: Then the whale swallowed him, and he was to blame.
verses.ar: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ

verses.en: Had he not been among those who praised.
verses.ar: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ

verses.en: He would have remained in its belly until the Day they are raised.
verses.ar: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

verses.en: Then We threw him into the open, and he was worn out.
verses.ar: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ

verses.en: And We made a grout tree grow over him.
verses.ar: وَأَنْبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِنْ يَقْطِينٍ

verses.en: Then We sent him to a hundred thousand, or more.
verses.ar: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

verses.en: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment for a while.
verses.ar: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

verses.en: Ask them, “Are the daughters for your Lord, and the sons for them?”
verses.ar: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ

verses.en: Or did We create the angels females, and they were witnesses?”
verses.ar: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ

verses.en: No indeed! It is of their perversions when they say.
verses.ar: أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ مِنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ

verses.en: “Allah has begotten.” They are certainly liars.
verses.ar: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ

verses.en: So He preferred girls over boys?
verses.ar: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ

verses.en: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
verses.ar: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ

verses.en: Do you not reflect?
verses.ar: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

verses.en: Or do you have some compelling proof?
verses.ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُبِينٌ

verses.en: Then bring your book, if you are truthful.
verses.ar: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ

verses.en: And they invented a relationship between Him and the jinn. But the jinns know that they will be summoned.
verses.ar: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

verses.en: Allah be glorified, far above what they describe.
verses.ar: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

verses.en: Not so for Allah’s sincere worshipers.
verses.ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ

verses.en: You and whatever you worship.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ

verses.en: Cannot seduce away from Him.
verses.ar: مَا أَنْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ

verses.en: Except for him who will roast in Hell.
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: “There is not one of us but has an assigned position.
verses.ar: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَعْلُومٌ

verses.en: And we are the arrangers.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ

verses.en: And we are the glorifiers.”
verses.ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ

verses.en: Even though they used to say.
verses.ar: وَإِنْ كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ

verses.en: “Had we received advice from the ancients.
verses.ar: لَوْ أَنَّ عِنْدَنَا ذِكْرًا مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: We would have been of Allah's faithful worshipers.”
verses.ar: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ

verses.en: But they rejected it, so they will soon know.
verses.ar: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: And Our word already went out to Our servants, the messengers.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: That it is they who will be helped.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنْصُورُونَ

verses.en: And Our forces will be the victors.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ جُنْدَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ

verses.en: So turn away from them for a while.
verses.ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

verses.en: And watch them—they will soon see.
verses.ar: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

verses.en: Do they want Our punishment in a hurry?
verses.ar: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

verses.en: When it descends on their courtyard, miserable will be the morning of those forewarned.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ

verses.en: So turn away from them for a while.
verses.ar: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

verses.en: And watch—they will soon see.
verses.ar: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

verses.en: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Glory—above what they claim!
verses.ar: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

verses.en: And peace be upon the Messengers.
verses.ar: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ

verses.en: And praise be to Allah, Lord of the Universes.
verses.ar: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Saad. By the Quran, full of reminders.
verses.ar: ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ

verses.en: Those who disbelieve are in arrogance and schism.
verses.ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ

verses.en: How many generations before them did We destroy? They cried out when it was too late to escape.
verses.ar: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوْا وَلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ

verses.en: And they marvel that a warner from among them came to them. The disbelievers said, “This is a lying sorcerer.”
verses.ar: وَعَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

verses.en: “Did he make the gods one God? This is something strange.”
verses.ar: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ

verses.en: And the notables among them announced: “Go on, and hold fast to your gods, this is something planned.
verses.ar: وَانْطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ

verses.en: We never heard of this in the former faith. This is nothing but an invention.
verses.ar: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ

verses.en: Was the message sent down to him, out of all of us?” In fact, they are doubtful of My message. In fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
verses.ar: أَأُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِنْ ذِكْرِي ۖ بَلْ لَمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ

verses.en: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord's mercy—the Majestic, the Giver?
verses.ar: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ

verses.en: Or do they possess the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend by some means.
verses.ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ

verses.en: An army of confederates will be defeated there.
verses.ar: جُنْدٌ مَا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِنَ الْأَحْزَابِ

verses.en: Before them, the people of Noah denied; as did Aad, and Pharaoh of the Stakes.
verses.ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ

verses.en: And Thamood, and the people of Lot, and the woods-dwellers: these are the parties.
verses.ar: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ

verses.en: None of them but denied the messengers, so My punishment was justified.
verses.ar: إِنْ كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

verses.en: These can expect but a single blast, from which there is no recovery.
verses.ar: وَمَا يَنْظُرُ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَا لَهَا مِنْ فَوَاقٍ

verses.en: And they say, “Our Lord, advance for us our share, before the Day of Account.”
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّلْ لَنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ

verses.en: Be patient in the face of what they say, and mention Our servant David, the resourceful. He was obedient.
verses.ar: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ

verses.en: We committed the mountains to praise with him, in the evening and at sunrise.
verses.ar: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ

verses.en: And the birds, flocking together—all obedient to him.
verses.ar: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ أَوَّابٌ

verses.en: And We strengthened his kingdom, and We gave him wisdom and decisive speech.
verses.ar: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ

verses.en: Has the story of the two disputants reached you, when they scaled the sanctuary?
verses.ar: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ

verses.en: When they entered upon David, he was startled by them. They said, “Do not fear. Two disputants: one of us has wronged the other, so judge between us fairly, and do not be biased, and guide us in the right way.”
verses.ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ

verses.en: “This brother of mine has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe. Yet he said, ‘Place it under my care,’ and he pressured me with speech.”
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ

verses.en: He said, “He has wronged you by asking that your ewe be added to his ewes. And many partners wrong one another, except those who believe and do righteous deeds—but these are so few.” And David realized that We were testing him, so he sought forgiveness from his Lord, fell down kneeling, and repented.
verses.ar: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩

verses.en: So We forgave him that. And for him is nearness to Us—and a beautiful return.
verses.ar: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ

verses.en: “O David, We made you a steward over this land, so judge between the people with justice, and do not follow the desire, lest it diverts you from Allah’s path. Those who stray from Allah’s path will have a severe punishment, for having ignored the Day of Account.”
verses.ar: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ

verses.en: We did not create the heaven and the earth and everything between them in vain. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve—so woe to those who disbelieve because of the Fire.
verses.ar: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ

verses.en: Or shall We make those who believe and perform righteous deeds like those who work corruption on earth? Or shall We make the reverent like the shameless?
verses.ar: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ

verses.en: A blessed Book that We sent down to you, so that they may ponder its Verses, and so that the people of understanding may reflect.
verses.ar: كِتَابٌ أَنْزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ

verses.en: And to David, We gave Solomon—what an excellent servant. He was penitent.
verses.ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ

verses.en: When the beautiful horses were paraded before him in the evening.
verses.ar: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ

verses.en: He said, “I have preferred the love of niceties over the remembrance of my Lord—until they disappeared behind the veil.
verses.ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ

verses.en: Bring them back to me.” And he began caressing their legs and necks.
verses.ar: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ

verses.en: And We tested Solomon, and We placed a body on his throne. Then he repented.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

verses.en: He said, “My Lord, forgive me, and grant me a kingdom never to be attained by anyone after me. You are the Giver.”
verses.ar: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ

verses.en: So We placed the wind at his service, blowing gently by his command, wherever he wanted.
verses.ar: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ

verses.en: And the devils—every builder and diver.
verses.ar: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ

verses.en: And others shackled in chains.
verses.ar: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ

verses.en: “This is Our gift. So give generously, or withhold, without an account.”
verses.ar: هَٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

verses.en: And for him is nearness to Us—and a beautiful resort.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ

verses.en: And mention Our servant Job, when he called upon his Lord, “Satan has touched me with distress and suffering.”
verses.ar: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ

verses.en: “Stomp with your foot—this is cool water to wash with, and to drink.”
verses.ar: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ

verses.en: And We restored his family to him, and their like with them, as a mercy from Us, and a lesson for those who possess insight.
verses.ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُمْ مَعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ

verses.en: “Take with your hand a bundle, and strike with it, and do not break your oath.” We found him patient. What an excellent servant! He was repentant.
verses.ar: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِبْ بِهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ

verses.en: And mention Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—endowed with ability and vision.
verses.ar: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ

verses.en: We distinguished them with a distinct quality: the remembrance of the Home.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُمْ بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ

verses.en: To Us: they are among the chosen, the outstanding.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِنْدَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ

verses.en: And mention Ishmael, Elisha, and Ezekiel: each is among the outstanding.
verses.ar: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِنَ الْأَخْيَارِ

verses.en: This is a reminder. The devout will have a good place of return.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ

verses.en: The Gardens of Eternity, with the doors, opened for them.
verses.ar: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُفَتَّحَةً لَهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ

verses.en: Relaxing in them—and calling for abundant fruit and beverage.
verses.ar: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ

verses.en: And with them will be attendants with a modest gaze, of equal age.
verses.ar: وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ

verses.en: This is what you are promised for the Day of Account.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ

verses.en: This is Our bounty—inexhaustible.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِنْ نَفَادٍ

verses.en: All This. But the transgressors will have a miserable return.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ

verses.en: Hell—in which they will roast—what a miserable place of return.
verses.ar: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ

verses.en: All this. Let them taste it—boiling and bitter cold.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ

verses.en: And similar torments of diverse kinds.
verses.ar: وَآخَرُ مِنْ شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ

verses.en: “This is a crowd rushing headlong with you.” No welcome for them. They will be scorched by the Fire.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُقْتَحِمٌ مَعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ

verses.en: They will say, “But it is you. No welcome for you. You brought it upon us. What a miserable end.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنْتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنْتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ

verses.en: They will say, “Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, give him double suffering in the Fire.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَنْ قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ

verses.en: And they will say, “What is the matter with us, that we do not see men whom we used to count among the wicked?
verses.ar: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُمْ مِنَ الْأَشْرَارِ

verses.en: Did we take them for mockery? Or did the eyes overlook them?”
verses.ar: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ

verses.en: This is certainly true—the feuding of the people of the Fire.
verses.ar: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ

verses.en: Say, “I am only a warner, and there is no god except Allah—the One, the Conqueror.
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنْذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ

verses.en: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything between them—the Mighty, the Forgiver.”
verses.ar: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ

verses.en: Say, “It is a message of great importance.
verses.ar: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ

verses.en: From which you are turning away.
verses.ar: أَنْتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ

verses.en: I have no knowledge of the Highest Assembly as they dispute.
