verses.en: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home in faith, and the believing men and believing women, and do not increase the wrongdoers except in ruin.”
verses.ar: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Say, “It was revealed to me that a group of jinn listened in, and said, ‘We have heard a wondrous Recitation.
verses.ar: قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا

verses.en: It guides to sound judgment, so we have believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord.
verses.ar: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَنْ نُشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا

verses.en: And He—exalted be the Grandeur of our Lord—never had a spouse, nor a child.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا

verses.en: But the fools among us used to say nonsense about Allah.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا

verses.en: And we had thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ تَقُولَ الْإِنْسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا

verses.en: And some individual humans used to seek power through some individual jinn, but they only increased them in confusion.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِنَ الْإِنْسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا

verses.en: And they thought, as you thought, that Allah would resurrect no one.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنْتُمْ أَنْ لَنْ يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا

verses.en: And we probed the heaven, and we found it filled with fierce guards and projectiles.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا

verses.en: And we used to take up positions to listen in, but whoever listens now finds a flare lying in wait for him.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَنْ يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَصَدًا

verses.en: And we do not know whether ill is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends guidance for them.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَنْ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا

verses.en: And among us are the righteous, but some of us are otherwise. We follow divergent paths.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا

verses.en: And we knew for certain that we could never thwart Allah on earth; nor could we ever thwart Him by fleeing.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَنْ لَنْ نُعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَنْ نُعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا

verses.en: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. Whoever believes in his Lord fears neither denial nor burden.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَنْ يُؤْمِنْ بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا

verses.en: And among us are the submitters, and among us are the deviant. As for those who have submitted—it is they who have attained Right Guidance.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا

verses.en: But as for the unjust—they will be fuel for Hell.’”
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا

verses.en: And had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them abundant water to drink.
verses.ar: وَأَنْ لَوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُمْ مَاءً غَدَقًا

verses.en: To test them with it. Whoever turns away from his Lord's remembrance, He will direct him to torment ever mounting.
verses.ar: لِنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يُعْرِضْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا

verses.en: And the places of worship are for Allah. So do not call, besides Allah, upon anyone else.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا

verses.en: And when Allah's servant stood up calling on Him, they almost fell on him in a mass.
verses.ar: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا

verses.en: Say, “I pray only to my Lord, and I never associate anyone with Him.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا

verses.en: Say, “It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا

verses.en: Say, “None will protect me from Allah; and I will find no refuge, except in Him.
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنِّي لَنْ يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِنْ دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا

verses.en: Except for a proclamation from Allah and His messages. Whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger—for him is the Fire of Hell, remaining in it forever.”
verses.ar: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا

verses.en: Until, when they see what they were promised, they will know who is weaker in helpers, and fewer in number.
verses.ar: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا

verses.en: Say, “I do not know whether what you are promised is near, or if my Lord will extend it for a period.”
verses.ar: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا

verses.en: The Knower of the invisible; He does not disclose His Unseen to anyone.
verses.ar: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا

verses.en: Except to a Messenger of His choosing. He then dispatches guards in front of him, and behind him.
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِنْ رَسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا

verses.en: So that He may know that they have conveyed their Lord’s message. He surrounds whatsoever is with them, and He has tallied everything by number.
verses.ar: لِيَعْلَمَ أَنْ قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: O you Enwrapped.
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ

verses.en: Stand vigil at night, except a little.
verses.ar: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

verses.en: Half of it, or reduce it a little.
verses.ar: نِصْفَهُ أَوِ انْقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا

verses.en: Or add to it—and recite the Quran slowly and rhythmically.
verses.ar: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا

verses.en: We are about to give you a heavy message.
verses.ar: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا

verses.en: The vigil of the night is more effective—and more conducive to recitation.
verses.ar: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا

verses.en: In the daytime, you have long work to do.
verses.ar: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا

verses.en: So remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.
verses.ar: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا

verses.en: Lord of the East and the West. There is no god except He, so take Him as a Trustee.
verses.ar: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا

verses.en: And patiently endure what they say, and withdraw from them politely.
verses.ar: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا

verses.en: And leave to Me the deniers—those of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.
verses.ar: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا

verses.en: With Us are shackles, and a Fierce Fire.
verses.ar: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنْكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا

verses.en: And food that chokes, and painful punishment.
verses.ar: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

verses.en: On the Day when the earth and the mountains tremble, and the mountains become heaps of sand.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَهِيلًا

verses.en: We sent to you a messenger, a witness over you, as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا

verses.en: But Pharaoh disobeyed the Messenger, so We seized him with a crushing seizing.
verses.ar: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا

verses.en: So how will you, if you persist in unbelief, save yourself from a Day which will turn the children gray-haired?
verses.ar: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِنْ كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا

verses.en: The sky will shatter thereby. His promise is always fulfilled.
verses.ar: السَّمَاءُ مُنْفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا

verses.en: This is a reminder. So whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا

verses.en: Your Lord knows that you stand vigil nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it, or third of it, along with a group of those with you. Allah determines the night and the day. He knows that you will be unable to sustain it, so He has relented towards you. So read of the Quran what is easy for you. He knows that some of you may be ill; and others traveling through the land, seeking Allah’s bounty; and others fighting in Allah’s way. So read of it what is easy for you, and perform the prayer, and give the purifying charity, and lend Allah a loan of goodness. Whatever good you advance for yourselves, you will find it with Allah, improved and greater in reward. And ask Allah for forgiveness—Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
verses.ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِنْ ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ لَنْ تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَنْ سَيَكُونُ مِنْكُمْ مَرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِنْ فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: O you covered up.
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ

verses.en: Arise and warn.
verses.ar: قُمْ فَأَنْذِرْ

verses.en: And glorify your Lord.
verses.ar: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ

verses.en: And purify your clothes.
verses.ar: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ

verses.en: And abandon abominations.
verses.ar: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ

verses.en: And show no favor, seeking gain.
verses.ar: وَلَا تَمْنُنْ تَسْتَكْثِرُ

verses.en: And be constant for your Lord.
verses.ar: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ

verses.en: When the Trumpet is sounded.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ

verses.en: That Day will be a difficult day.
verses.ar: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ

verses.en: For the disbelievers—not easy.
verses.ar: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ

verses.en: Leave Me alone to him whom I created.
verses.ar: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا

verses.en: And gave him vast wealth.
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَمْدُودًا

verses.en: And children as witnesses.
verses.ar: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا

verses.en: And smoothed things for him.
verses.ar: وَمَهَّدْتُ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا

verses.en: Yet he desires that I should add more.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ

verses.en: By no means! He was stubborn towards Our revelations.
verses.ar: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا

verses.en: I will exhaust him increasingly.
verses.ar: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا

verses.en: He thought and analyzed.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ

verses.en: May he perish, how he analyzed.
verses.ar: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

verses.en: Again: may he perish, how he analyzed.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

verses.en: Then he looked.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ

verses.en: Then he frowned and whined.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ

verses.en: Then he turned his back and was proud.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ

verses.en: And said, “This is nothing but magic from the past.
verses.ar: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ

verses.en: This is nothing but the word of a human being.”
verses.ar: إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ

verses.en: I will roast him in Saqar.
verses.ar: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ

verses.en: But what will explain to you what Saqar is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ

verses.en: It neither leaves nor spares.
verses.ar: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ

verses.en: It scorches the skin.
verses.ar: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِلْبَشَرِ

verses.en: Over it are Nineteen.
verses.ar: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ

verses.en: We have appointed none but angels as wardens of the Fire; and We caused their number to be a stumbling block for those who disbelieve; so that those given the Scripture may attain certainty; and those who believe may increase in faith; and those given the Scripture and the believers may not doubt; and those in whose hearts is sickness and the unbelievers may say, “What did Allah intend by this parable?” Thus Allah leads astray whom He wills, and He guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except He. And it is but a reminder to the humans.
verses.ar: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ

verses.en: But no! By the moon.
verses.ar: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ

verses.en: And the night as it retreats.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ

verses.en: And the morning as it brightens.
verses.ar: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ

verses.en: It is one of the greatest.
verses.ar: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ

verses.en: A warning to humans.
verses.ar: نَذِيرًا لِلْبَشَرِ

verses.en: To those among you who wish to advance, or lag behind.
verses.ar: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ

verses.en: Every soul is hostage to what it has done.
verses.ar: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ

verses.en: Except for those on the Right.
verses.ar: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ

verses.en: In Gardens, asking one another.
verses.ar: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ

verses.en: About the guilty.
verses.ar: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ

verses.en: “What led you into Saqar?”
verses.ar: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ

verses.en: They will say, “We were not of those who prayed.
verses.ar: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ

verses.en: Nor did we feed the poor.
verses.ar: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ

verses.en: And we used to indulge with those who indulge.
verses.ar: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ

verses.en: And we used to deny Judgement Day.
verses.ar: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ

verses.en: Until certainty came upon us.”
verses.ar: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ

verses.en: But the intercession of intercessors will not benefit them.
verses.ar: فَمَا تَنْفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ

verses.en: So what is the matter with them, turning away from the Reminder?
verses.ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ

verses.en: As if they were panicked donkeys.
verses.ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُسْتَنْفِرَةٌ

verses.en: Fleeing from a lion.
verses.ar: فَرَّتْ مِنْ قَسْوَرَةٍ

verses.en: Yet every one of them wants to be given scrolls unrolled.
verses.ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ أَنْ يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُنَشَّرَةً

verses.en: No indeed! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
verses.ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ لَا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ

verses.en: Nevertheless, it is a reminder.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ

verses.en: So whoever wills, shall remember it.
verses.ar: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ

verses.en: But they will not remember—unless Allah wills. He is the Source of Righteousness and the Source of Forgiveness.
verses.ar: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
verses.ar: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ

verses.en: And I swear by the blaming soul.
verses.ar: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ

verses.en: Does the human being think that We will not gather his bones?
verses.ar: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَلَّنْ نَجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ

verses.en: Yes indeed! We are able to reconstruct his fingertips.
verses.ar: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَنْ نُسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ

verses.en: But the human being wants to deny what lies ahead of him.
verses.ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنْسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ

verses.en: He asks, “When is the Day of Resurrection?”
verses.ar: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ

verses.en: When vision is dazzled.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ

verses.en: And the moon is eclipsed.
verses.ar: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ

verses.en: And the sun and the moon are joined together.
verses.ar: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ

verses.en: On that Day, man will say, “Where is the escape?”
verses.ar: يَقُولُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ

verses.en: No indeed! There is no refuge.
verses.ar: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ

verses.en: To your Lord on that Day is the settlement.
verses.ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ

verses.en: On that Day, man will be informed of what he put forward, and what he left behind.
verses.ar: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنْسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

verses.en: And man will be evidence against himself.
verses.ar: بَلِ الْإِنْسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ

verses.en: Even as he presents his excuses.
verses.ar: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ

verses.en: Do not move your tongue with it, to hurry on with it.
verses.ar: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ

verses.en: Upon Us are its collection and its recitation.
verses.ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ

verses.en: Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ

verses.en: Then upon Us is its explanation.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ

verses.en: Alas! But you love the Fleeting.
verses.ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ

verses.en: And you disregard the Hereafter.
verses.ar: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ

verses.en: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
verses.ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاضِرَةٌ

verses.en: Looking towards their Lord.
verses.ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ

verses.en: And faces on that Day will be gloomy.
verses.ar: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ

verses.en: Realizing that a back-breaker has befallen them.
verses.ar: تَظُنُّ أَنْ يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ

verses.en: Indeed, when it has reached the collarbones.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ

verses.en: And it is said, “Who is the healer?”
verses.ar: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ

verses.en: And he realizes that it is the parting.
verses.ar: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ

verses.en: And the leg is entwined with the leg.
verses.ar: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ

verses.en: To your Lord on that Day is the drive.
verses.ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ

verses.en: He neither believed nor prayed.
verses.ar: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

verses.en: But he denied and turned away.
verses.ar: وَلَٰكِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verses.en: Then he went to his family, walking proudly.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ

verses.en: So nearer to you! And nearer!
verses.ar: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

verses.en: Then again: Nearer to you! And nearer!
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

verses.en: Does the human being think that he will be left without purpose?
verses.ar: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنْ يُتْرَكَ سُدًى

verses.en: Was he not a fertilized egg from ejaculated semen?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِنْ مَنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ

verses.en: Then he became a clot. And He created and proportioned?
verses.ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

verses.en: And He made of him the two sexes: the male, and the female?
verses.ar: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ

verses.en: Is not such able to give life to the dead?
verses.ar: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Has there come upon the human being a span of time when he was nothing to be mentioned?
verses.ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنْسَانِ حِينٌ مِنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُنْ شَيْئًا مَذْكُورًا

verses.en: We created the human being from a drop of mixed fluid, to test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
verses.ar: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا

verses.en: We guided him to the way, be he appreciative or unappreciative.
verses.ar: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

verses.en: We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, and yokes, and a Searing Fire.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا

verses.en: But the righteous will drink from a cup mixed with aroma.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِنْ كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

verses.en: A spring from which Allah’s servants will drink, making it gush abundantly.
verses.ar: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

verses.en: They fulfill their vows, and they dread a Day whose ill is widespread.
verses.ar: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا

verses.en: And they feed, for the love of Him, the poor, the orphan, and the prisoner.
verses.ar: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا

verses.en: “We feed you only for Allah’s sake. We desire from you neither compensation nor gratitude.
verses.ar: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنْكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا

verses.en: We dread from our Lord a frowning, grim Day.”
verses.ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِنْ رَبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا

verses.en: So Allah will shield them from the horror of that Day, and He will grant them radiance and joy.
verses.ar: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا

verses.en: And He will reward them, for having been patient, with a Garden and silk.
verses.ar: وَجَزَاهُمْ بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا

verses.en: Reclining in it on the couches; experiencing in it neither sun nor bitter cold.
verses.ar: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا

verses.en: Its shade hovering over them, and its fruit brought low within reach.
verses.ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

verses.en: Circulating among them are vessels of silver, and cups of crystal.
verses.ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِآنِيَةٍ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا

verses.en: Crystalline silver—they measured them precisely.
verses.ar: قَوَارِيرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا

verses.en: And they will be given a drink flavored with ginger.
verses.ar: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنْجَبِيلًا

verses.en: From a spring there, named Salsabeel.
verses.ar: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا

verses.en: Passing among them are eternalized youths. If you saw them, you would think them sprinkled pearls.
verses.ar: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَنْثُورًا

verses.en: If you look, and look, you will see bliss and a vast kingdom.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا

verses.en: Upon them are garments of green silk and satin. And they will be decorated with silver bracelets. And their Lord will offer them a pure drink.
verses.ar: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُنْدُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِنْ فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا

verses.en: “This is a reward for you. Your efforts are well appreciated.”
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُمْ مَشْكُورًا

verses.en: It is We who sent down the Quran upon you—a gradual revelation.
verses.ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنْزِيلًا

verses.en: So be patient with your Lord’s judgment. And obey among them neither sinner nor disbeliever.
verses.ar: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا

verses.en: And mention the Name of your Lord, morning and evening.
verses.ar: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

verses.en: And during the night, prostrate to Him, and glorify Him long into the night.
verses.ar: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا

verses.en: As for these: they love the transient, and they leave behind a Heavy Day.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا

verses.en: We created them, and We strengthened their frames. And whenever We will, We will replace them with others like them.
verses.ar: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

verses.en: This is a reminder; so whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا

verses.en: Yet you cannot will—unless Allah wills. Allah is Knowing and Wise.
verses.ar: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

verses.en: He admits into His mercy whomever He wills. But as for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
verses.ar: يُدْخِلُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By those sent in succession.
verses.ar: وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا

verses.en: And those storming turbulently.
verses.ar: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا

verses.en: And the spreaders spreading.
verses.ar: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا

verses.en: And the separators separating.
verses.ar: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا

verses.en: And those delivering a reminder.
verses.ar: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا

verses.en: Excusing or warning.
verses.ar: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا

verses.en: What you are promised will surely happen.
verses.ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ

verses.en: When the stars are blotted out.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ

verses.en: And the sky is fractured.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ

verses.en: And the mountains are powdered.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ

verses.en: And the messengers’ time is appointed.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ

verses.en: Until which Day was it postponed?
verses.ar: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ

verses.en: Until the Day of Separation.
verses.ar: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what the Day of Separation is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: Did We not destroy the ancients?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: Then succeeded them with the others?
verses.ar: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ

verses.en: Thus We deal with the guilty.
verses.ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: Did We not create you from a base fluid?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقْكُمْ مِنْ مَاءٍ مَهِينٍ

verses.en: Then lodged it in a secure place?
verses.ar: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَكِينٍ

verses.en: For a known period?
verses.ar: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَعْلُومٍ

verses.en: And We measured. How excellently We measure.
verses.ar: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: Did We not make the earth a homestead?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا

verses.en: For the living and the dead?
verses.ar: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا

verses.en: And We placed on it lofty mountains, and We gave you fresh water to drink?
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُمْ مَاءً فُرَاتًا

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the rejecters.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: “Proceed to what you used to deny.”
verses.ar: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ

verses.en: “Proceed to a three-pronged shadow.”
verses.ar: انْطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ

verses.en: That provides no shade, nor avails against the flames.
verses.ar: لَا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ

verses.en: It shoots up sparks like towers.
verses.ar: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ

verses.en: As if they are yellow camels.
verses.ar: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: This is a Day when they will not speak.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنْطِقُونَ

verses.en: And they will not be permitted to offer excuses.
verses.ar: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: This is the Day of Separation. We have gathered you, together with the ancients.
verses.ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: So if you have a scheme, then scheme against Me!
verses.ar: فَإِنْ كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the falsifiers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: The reverent will be amidst shades and springs.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ

verses.en: And fruits of whatever they desire.
verses.ar: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

verses.en: “Eat and drink pleasantly, for what you used to do.”
verses.ar: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verses.en: Thus We reward the virtuous.
verses.ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: “Eat and enjoy a little; you are guilty.”
verses.ar: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُمْ مُجْرِمُونَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the liars.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: And when it is said to them, “Bow down,” they do not bow down.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: So in what saying, beyond this, will they believe?
verses.ar: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: What are they asking one another about?
verses.ar: عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ

verses.en: About the Momentous News.
verses.ar: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ

verses.en: About which they disagree.
verses.ar: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ

verses.en: Surely, they will know.
verses.ar: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: Most certainly, they will know.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: Did We not make the earth a cradle?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا

verses.en: And the mountains pegs?
verses.ar: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا

verses.en: And created you in pairs?
verses.ar: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا

verses.en: And made your sleep for rest?
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا

verses.en: And made the night a cover?
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا

verses.en: And made the day for livelihood?
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا

verses.en: And constructed above you seven firmaments?
verses.ar: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا

verses.en: And placed a blazing lamp?
verses.ar: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا

verses.en: And sent down from the clouds pouring water?
verses.ar: وَأَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا

verses.en: To produce with it grains and vegetation?
verses.ar: لِنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا

verses.en: And lush gardens?
verses.ar: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا

verses.en: The Day of Sorting has been appointed.
verses.ar: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا

verses.en: The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in crowds.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يُنْفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا

verses.en: And the sky is opened up, and it becomes gateways.
verses.ar: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا

verses.en: And the mountains are set in motion, and they become a mirage.
verses.ar: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا

verses.en: Hell is lying in ambush.
verses.ar: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا

verses.en: For the oppressors, a destination.
verses.ar: لِلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا

verses.en: Where they will remain for eons.
verses.ar: لَابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا

verses.en: They will taste in it neither coolness nor drink.
verses.ar: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا

verses.en: Except boiling water and freezing hail.
verses.ar: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا

verses.en: An appropriate punishment.
verses.ar: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا

verses.en: They were not anticipating any reckoning.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا

verses.en: And they denied Our signs with utter denial.
verses.ar: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا

verses.en: And We have recorded everything in a book.
verses.ar: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا

verses.en: So taste! We will increase you in nothing but suffering.
verses.ar: فَذُوقُوا فَلَنْ نَزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا

verses.en: But for the righteous, there is triumph.
verses.ar: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا

verses.en: Gardens and vineyards.
verses.ar: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا

verses.en: And splendid spouses, well-matched.
verses.ar: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا

verses.en: And overflowing cups.
verses.ar: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا

verses.en: They will hear in it neither gossip nor lies.
verses.ar: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا

verses.en: A reward from your Lord, a calculated reward.
verses.ar: جَزَاءً مِنْ رَبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا

verses.en: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and whatever is between them—The Most Merciful—they will have no authorization from Him to speak.
verses.ar: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا

verses.en: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in a row. They will not speak, except those granted permission by the Compassionate and whose words are true.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا

verses.en: This is the Day of Reality. So whoever wills, let him take a path back to his Lord.
verses.ar: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا

verses.en: We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day when a person will observe what his hands have produced, and the unbeliever will say, “I wish I were dust.”
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَنْذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنْظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنْتُ تُرَابًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By those snatching violently.
verses.ar: وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا

verses.en: And those removing gently.
verses.ar: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا

verses.en: And those gliding smoothly.
verses.ar: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا

verses.en: And those racing swiftly.
verses.ar: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا

verses.en: And those regulating events.
verses.ar: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا

verses.en: On the Day when the Quake quakes.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ

verses.en: And is followed by the Successor.
verses.ar: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ

verses.en: Hearts on that Day will be pounding.
verses.ar: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ

verses.en: Their sights downcast.
verses.ar: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ

verses.en: They say, “Are we to be restored to the original condition?
verses.ar: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ

verses.en: When we have become hollow bones?”
verses.ar: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَخِرَةً

verses.en: They say, “This is a losing proposition.”
verses.ar: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ

verses.en: But it will be only a single nudge.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ

verses.en: And they will be awake.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا هُمْ بِالسَّاهِرَةِ

verses.en: Has the story of Moses reached you?
verses.ar: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ

verses.en: When His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
verses.ar: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

verses.en: “Go to Pharaoh—he has transgressed.”
verses.ar: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ

verses.en: And say, “Do you care to be purified?
verses.ar: فَقُلْ هَلْ لَكَ إِلَىٰ أَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ

verses.en: And I will guide you to your Lord, and you will turn reverent.”
verses.ar: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ

verses.en: Then he showed him the Great Miracle.
verses.ar: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ

verses.en: But he denied and disobeyed.
verses.ar: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ

verses.en: Then he turned his back, and tried.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ

verses.en: And gathered and proclaimed.
verses.ar: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ

verses.en: He said, “I am your Lord, the most high.”
verses.ar: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ

verses.en: So Allah seized him with exemplary punishment, in the last and in the first.
verses.ar: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ

verses.en: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.
verses.ar: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِمَنْ يَخْشَىٰ

verses.en: Are you more difficult to create, or the sky? He constructed it.
verses.ar: أَأَنْتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا

verses.en: He raised its masses, and He proportioned it.
verses.ar: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا

verses.en: And He dimmed its night, and He brought out its daylight.
verses.ar: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا

verses.en: And after that, He spread out the earth.
verses.ar: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا

verses.en: And from it, He brought out its water and its pasture.
verses.ar: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا

verses.en: And the mountains, He anchored.
verses.ar: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا

verses.en: A source of enjoyment for you and your livestock.
verses.ar: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ

verses.en: But when the Great Cataclysm befalls.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ

verses.en: A Day when the human being will remember what he has endeavored.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ

verses.en: And the Furnace will be displayed for whoever sees.
verses.ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَنْ يَرَىٰ

verses.en: As for him who has transgressed.
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ طَغَىٰ

verses.en: And preferred the life of this world.
verses.ar: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا

verses.en: Then the Furnace is the shelter.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ

verses.en: But as for him who feared the Standing of his Lord, and restrained the self from desires.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ

verses.en: Then Paradise is the shelter.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ

verses.en: They ask you about the Hour, “When will it take place?”
verses.ar: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا

verses.en: You have no knowledge of it.
verses.ar: فِيمَ أَنْتَ مِنْ ذِكْرَاهَا

verses.en: To your Lord is its finality.
verses.ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنْتَهَاهَا

verses.en: You are only to warn whoever dreads it.
verses.ar: إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُنْذِرُ مَنْ يَخْشَاهَا

verses.en: On the Day when they see it—it will be as if they had stayed only an evening or its morning.
verses.ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: He frowned and turned away.
verses.ar: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verses.en: Because the blind man came to him.
verses.ar: أَنْ جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ

verses.en: But how do you know? Perhaps he was seeking to purify himself.
verses.ar: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ

verses.en: Or be reminded, and the message would benefit him.
verses.ar: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنْفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ

verses.en: But as for him who was indifferent.
verses.ar: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ

verses.en: You gave him your attention.
verses.ar: فَأَنْتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ

verses.en: Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
verses.ar: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ

verses.en: But as for him who came to you seeking.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ

verses.en: In awe.
verses.ar: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ

verses.en: To him you were inattentive.
verses.ar: فَأَنْتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ

verses.en: Do not. This is a Lesson.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ

verses.en: So whoever wills, shall take notice from it.
verses.ar: فَمَنْ شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ

verses.en: In honorable pages.
verses.ar: فِي صُحُفٍ مُكَرَّمَةٍ

verses.en: Elevated and purified.
verses.ar: مَرْفُوعَةٍ مُطَهَّرَةٍ

verses.en: By the hands of scribes.
verses.ar: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ

verses.en: Noble and virtuous.
verses.ar: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ

verses.en: Perish the human being! How ungrateful he is!
verses.ar: قُتِلَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ

verses.en: From what thing did He create him?
verses.ar: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ

verses.en: From a drop He created him. Then He proportioned him.
verses.ar: مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ

verses.en: Then He eased the way for him.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ

verses.en: Then He puts him to death, and He buries him.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ

verses.en: Then, whenever He wills, He will resurrect him.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنْشَرَهُ

verses.en: But no, he did not fulfill what He commanded him.
verses.ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ

verses.en: Let the human being look at his food.
verses.ar: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ

verses.en: How We pour down water in abundance.
verses.ar: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا

verses.en: Then crack the soil open.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا

verses.en: And grow in it grains.
verses.ar: فَأَنْبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا

verses.en: And grapes and herbs.
verses.ar: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا

verses.en: And olives and dates.
verses.ar: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا

verses.en: And luscious gardens.
verses.ar: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا

verses.en: And fruits and vegetables.
verses.ar: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا

verses.en: As sustenance for you and for your livestock.
verses.ar: مَتَاعًا لَكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ

verses.en: But when the Deafening Blast comes to pass.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ

verses.en: The Day when a person will flee from his brother.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ

verses.en: And his mother and his father.
verses.ar: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ

verses.en: And his spouse and his children.
verses.ar: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ

verses.en: Every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him.
verses.ar: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ

verses.en: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
verses.ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُسْفِرَةٌ

verses.en: Laughing and rejoicing.
verses.ar: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُسْتَبْشِرَةٌ

verses.en: And faces on that Day will be covered with dust.
verses.ar: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ

verses.en: Covered by darkness.
verses.ar: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ

verses.en: These are the faithless, the vicious.
verses.ar: أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: When the sun is rolled.
verses.ar: إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ

verses.en: And the stars are dimmed.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انْكَدَرَتْ

verses.en: And the mountains are set in motion.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ

verses.en: And the relationships are suspended.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ

verses.en: And the beasts are gathered.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ

verses.en: And the oceans are set aflame.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ

verses.en: And the souls are paired.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ

verses.en: And the girl, buried alive, is asked:
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ

verses.en: For what crime was she killed?
verses.ar: بِأَيِّ ذَنْبٍ قُتِلَتْ

verses.en: And when the pages are made public.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ

verses.en: And the sky is peeled away.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ

verses.en: And the Fire is set ablaze.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ

verses.en: And Paradise is brought near.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ

verses.en: Each soul will know what it has readied.
verses.ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا أَحْضَرَتْ

verses.en: I swear by the galaxies.
verses.ar: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ

verses.en: Precisely running their courses.
verses.ar: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ

verses.en: And by the night, as it dissipates.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ

verses.en: And by the morning, as it breathes.
verses.ar: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ

verses.en: This is the speech of a noble messenger.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ

verses.en: Endowed with strength, secure with the Lord of the Throne.
verses.ar: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِنْدَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ

verses.en: Obeyed and trustworthy.
verses.ar: مُطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ

verses.en: Your friend is not possessed.
verses.ar: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُمْ بِمَجْنُونٍ

verses.en: He saw him on the clear horizon.
verses.ar: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ

verses.en: And He does not withhold knowledge of the Unseen.
verses.ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ

verses.en: And it is not the word of an outcast devil.
verses.ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَجِيمٍ

verses.en: So where are you heading?
verses.ar: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ

verses.en: It is nothing but a reminder for humankind.
verses.ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: To whoever among you wills to go straight.
verses.ar: لِمَنْ شَاءَ مِنْكُمْ أَنْ يَسْتَقِيمَ

verses.en: But you cannot will, unless Allah wills, Lord of the Worlds.
verses.ar: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: When the sky breaks apart.
verses.ar: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْفَطَرَتْ

verses.en: When the planets are scattered.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انْتَثَرَتْ

verses.en: When the oceans are exploded.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ

verses.en: When the graves are tossed around.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ

verses.en: Every soul will know what it has advanced, and what it has deferred.
verses.ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ

verses.en: O, man! What deluded you concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ

verses.en: He Who created you, and formed you, and proportioned you.
verses.ar: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ

verses.en: In whatever form He willed, He assembled you.
verses.ar: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ

verses.en: But you reject the religion.
verses.ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ

verses.en: Although there are guardians over you.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ

verses.en: Honest recorders.
verses.ar: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ

verses.en: They know everything you do.
verses.ar: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ

verses.en: The righteous will be in bliss.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ

verses.en: And the wicked will be in Hell.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ

verses.en: They will enter it on Judgment Day.
verses.ar: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ

verses.en: And they will not be absent from it.
verses.ar: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ

verses.en: Then again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
verses.ar: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ

verses.en: The Day when no soul will avail another soul whatsoever—and all authority on that Day is Allah’s.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلَّهِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Woe to the defrauders.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ لِلْمُطَفِّفِينَ

verses.en: Those who, when they take a measure from people, demand in full.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

verses.en: But when they measure or weigh to others, they cheat.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَوْ وَزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ

verses.en: Do these not know that they will be resurrected?
verses.ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَٰئِكَ أَنَّهُمْ مَبْعُوثُونَ

verses.en: For a Tremendous Day?
verses.ar: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

verses.en: The Day when Humankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ

verses.en: Not at all. The record of the wicked is in Sijjeen.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what Sijjeen is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ

verses.en: A numerical book.
verses.ar: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ

verses.en: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verses.en: Those who deny the Day of Reckoning.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ

verses.en: But none denies it except the sinful aggressor.
verses.ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

verses.en: When Our Verses are read to him, he says, “Legends of the ancients.”
verses.ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ

verses.en: But no! Their hearts have become corroded by what they used to commit.
verses.ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ مَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ

verses.en: Undoubtedly, on that Day, they will be screened from their Lord.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَنْ رَبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَمَحْجُوبُونَ

verses.en: Then they will roast in the Blaze.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ

verses.en: Then it will be said, “This is what you used to deny.”
verses.ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ

verses.en: No indeed. The record of the righteous is in Elliyyeen.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what Elliyyoon is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ

verses.en: A numerical book.
verses.ar: كِتَابٌ مَرْقُومٌ

verses.en: Witnessed by those brought near.
verses.ar: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ

verses.en: Surely, the virtuous will be in bliss.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ

verses.en: On luxurious furnishings, gazing around.
verses.ar: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ

verses.en: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.
verses.ar: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ

verses.en: They will be given to drink of pure sealed wine.
verses.ar: يُسْقَوْنَ مِنْ رَحِيقٍ مَخْتُومٍ

verses.en: Its seal is musk—this is what competitors should compete for.
verses.ar: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ

verses.en: And its mixture is of Tasneem.
verses.ar: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِنْ تَسْنِيمٍ

verses.en: A spring from which those brought near drink.
verses.ar: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ

verses.en: Those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ

verses.en: And when they passed by them, they would wink at one another.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ

verses.en: And when they returned to their families, they would return joyfully.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا انْقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انْقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ

verses.en: And when they saw them, they would say, “These people are lost.”
verses.ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ

verses.en: Although they were not sent as guardians over them.
verses.ar: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ

verses.en: But on that Day, those who believed will laugh at the unbelievers.
verses.ar: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

verses.en: On luxurious furnishings, looking on.
verses.ar: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنْظُرُونَ

verses.en: Have the unbelievers been repaid for what they used to do?
verses.ar: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: When the sky is ruptured.
verses.ar: إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انْشَقَّتْ

verses.en: And obeys its Lord, as it must.
verses.ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

verses.en: And when the earth is stretched.
verses.ar: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ

verses.en: And ejects its contents and becomes empty.
verses.ar: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ

verses.en: And obeys its Lord, as it must.
verses.ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

verses.en: O, man! You are laboring towards your Lord, and you will meet Him.
verses.ar: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنْسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ

verses.en: As for him who is given his book in his right hand.
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ

verses.en: He will be reckoned with an easy reckoning.
verses.ar: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا

verses.en: And will return to his family delighted.
verses.ar: وَيَنْقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا

verses.en: But as for him who is given his book behind his back.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ

verses.en: He will call for destruction.
verses.ar: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا

verses.en: And will enter a Blaze.
verses.ar: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

verses.en: He used to be happy among his family.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا

verses.en: He thought he would not return.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَنْ لَنْ يَحُورَ

verses.en: In fact, His Lord was watching him.
verses.ar: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا

verses.en: I swear by the twilight.
verses.ar: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ

verses.en: And by the night, and what it enshrouds.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

verses.en: And by the moon, when it is full.
verses.ar: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ

verses.en: You will mount stage by stage.
verses.ar: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَنْ طَبَقٍ

verses.en: So what is the matter with them, that they do not believe?
verses.ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

verses.en: And when the Quran is read to them, they do not bow down?
verses.ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩

verses.en: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
verses.ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ

verses.en: But Allah knows what they hide inside.
verses.ar: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

verses.en: So inform them of a painful punishment.
verses.ar: فَبَشِّرْهُمْ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

verses.en: Except for those who believe and do good deeds—they will have a never-ending reward.
verses.ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the sky full of constellations.
verses.ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ

verses.en: And by the Promised Day.
verses.ar: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ

verses.en: And by the witness and the witnessed.
verses.ar: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ

verses.en: Destroyed were the People of the Trench.
verses.ar: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ

verses.en: The fire supplied with fuel.
verses.ar: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ

verses.en: While they sat around it.
verses.ar: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ

verses.en: And were witnessing what they were doing to the believers.
verses.ar: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ

verses.en: They took vengeance on them only because they believed in Allah the Almighty, the Praised.
verses.ar: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ

verses.en: He to Whom belongs sovereignty over the heavens and the earth. And Allah is witness over everything.
verses.ar: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

verses.en: Those who persecute believing men and believing women, then do not repent: for them is the punishment of Hell, and for them is the punishment of Burning.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ

verses.en: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have Gardens beneath which rivers flow: that is the supreme triumph.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ

verses.en: The onslaught of your Lord is severe.
verses.ar: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

verses.en: It is He who begins and repeats.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

verses.en: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.
verses.ar: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ

verses.en: Owner of the Glorious Throne.
verses.ar: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ

verses.en: Doer of whatever He wills.
verses.ar: فَعَّالٌ لِمَا يُرِيدُ

verses.en: Has the story of the legions reached you?
verses.ar: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ

verses.en: Of Pharaoh and Thamood?
verses.ar: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ

verses.en: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
verses.ar: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ

verses.en: But Allah encloses them from beyond.
verses.ar: وَاللَّهُ مِنْ وَرَائِهِمْ مُحِيطٌ

verses.en: In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.
verses.ar: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَجِيدٌ

verses.en: In a Preserved Tablet.
verses.ar: فِي لَوْحٍ مَحْفُوظٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the sky and the Pulsar.
verses.ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what the Pulsar is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ

verses.en: The Piercing Star.
verses.ar: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ

verses.en: There is no soul without a guardian over it.
verses.ar: إِنْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ

verses.en: So let the human being consider what he was created from.
verses.ar: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْإِنْسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

verses.en: He was created from gushing fluid.
verses.ar: خُلِقَ مِنْ مَاءٍ دَافِقٍ

verses.en: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.
verses.ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنْ بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ

verses.en: He is certainly able to return him.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ

verses.en: On the Day when secrets are disclosed.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ

verses.en: He will have neither strength nor helper.
verses.ar: فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ

verses.en: By the sky that returns.
verses.ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ

verses.en: And the earth that cracks open.
verses.ar: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ

verses.en: It is a Decisive Word.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ

verses.en: And it is no joke.
verses.ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ

verses.en: They plot and scheme.
verses.ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا

verses.en: But I plan and plan.
verses.ar: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا

verses.en: Therefore, give the unbelievers some time; leave them for a while.
verses.ar: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Praise the Name of your Lord, the Most High.
verses.ar: سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى

verses.en: He who creates and regulates.
verses.ar: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

verses.en: He who measures and guides.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

verses.en: He who produces the pasture.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ

verses.en: Then reduces it to light debris.
verses.ar: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ

verses.en: We will make you read, so do not forget.
verses.ar: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنْسَىٰ

verses.en: Except what Allah wills. He knows what is declared, and what is hidden.
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ

verses.en: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.
verses.ar: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

verses.en: So remind, if the reminder is beneficial.
verses.ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنْ نَفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ

verses.en: He who fears will take notice.
verses.ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَنْ يَخْشَىٰ

verses.en: But the most wretched will avoid it.
verses.ar: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى

verses.en: He who will enter the Gigantic Fire.
verses.ar: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ

verses.en: Where he will neither die, nor live.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

verses.en: Successful is he who purifies himself.
verses.ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ تَزَكَّىٰ

verses.en: And remembers the Name of his Lord, and prays.
verses.ar: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ

verses.en: But you prefer the present life.
verses.ar: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا

verses.en: Even though the Hereafter is better and more lasting.
verses.ar: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ

verses.en: This is in the earlier scriptures.
verses.ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ

verses.en: The Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
verses.ar: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Has the news of the Overwhelming reached you?
verses.ar: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ

verses.en: Faces on that Day will be downcast.
verses.ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ

verses.en: Laboring and exhausted.
verses.ar: عَامِلَةٌ نَاصِبَةٌ

verses.en: Entering a scorching Fire.
verses.ar: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً

verses.en: Given to drink from a flaming spring.
verses.ar: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ

verses.en: They will have no food except thorns.
verses.ar: لَيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ ضَرِيعٍ

verses.en: Neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.
verses.ar: لَا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنْ جُوعٍ

verses.en: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
verses.ar: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَاعِمَةٌ

verses.en: Satisfied with their endeavor.
verses.ar: لِسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ

verses.en: In a lofty Garden.
verses.ar: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ

verses.en: In it, you will hear no nonsense.
verses.ar: لَا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً

verses.en: In it, is a flowing spring.
verses.ar: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ

verses.en: In it, are raised beds.
verses.ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَرْفُوعَةٌ

verses.en: And cups set in place.
verses.ar: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَوْضُوعَةٌ

verses.en: And cushions lined up.
verses.ar: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ

verses.en: And carpets spread around.
verses.ar: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ

verses.en: Do they not look at the camels—how they are created?
verses.ar: أَفَلَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

verses.en: And at the sky—how it is raised?
verses.ar: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ

verses.en: And at the mountains—how they are installed?
verses.ar: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ

verses.en: And at the earth—how it is spread out?
verses.ar: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ

verses.en: So remind. You are only a reminder.
verses.ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنْتَ مُذَكِّرٌ

verses.en: You have no control over them.
verses.ar: لَسْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِمُصَيْطِرٍ

verses.en: But whoever turns away and disbelieves.
verses.ar: إِلَّا مَنْ تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

verses.en: Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
verses.ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ

verses.en: To Us is their return.
verses.ar: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ

verses.en: Then upon Us rests their reckoning.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُمْ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the dawn.
verses.ar: وَالْفَجْرِ

verses.en: And ten nights.
verses.ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ

verses.en: And the even and the odd.
verses.ar: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ

verses.en: And the night as it recedes.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ

verses.en: Is there an oath in that for a rational person?
verses.ar: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِذِي حِجْرٍ

verses.en: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

verses.en: Erum of the pillars.
verses.ar: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ

verses.en: The like of which was never created in the land.
verses.ar: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ

verses.en: And Thamood—those who carved out the rocks in the Valley.
verses.ar: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ

verses.en: And Pharaoh of the Stakes.
verses.ar: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ

verses.en: Those who committed excesses in the lands.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ

verses.en: And spread much corruption in it.
verses.ar: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ

verses.en: So your Lord poured down on them a scourge of punishment.
verses.ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ

verses.en: Your Lord is on the lookout.
verses.ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ

verses.en: As for the human being, whenever his Lord tests him, and honors him, and prospers him, he says, “My Lord has honored me.”
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا الْإِنْسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ

verses.en: But whenever He tests him, and He restricts his livelihood for him, he says, “My Lord has disgraced me.”
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ

verses.en: Not at all. But you are not generous towards the orphan.
verses.ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ لَا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ

verses.en: And you do not urge the feeding of the poor.
verses.ar: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ

verses.en: And you devour inheritance with all greed.
verses.ar: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَمًّا

verses.en: And you love wealth with immense love.
verses.ar: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا

verses.en: No—when the earth is pounded, crushed, and leveled.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا

verses.en: And your Lord comes, with the angels, row after row.
verses.ar: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا

verses.en: And on that Day, Hell will be brought. On that Day, the human being will remember, but how will remembrance avail him?
verses.ar: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنْسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ

verses.en: He will say, “If only I had forwarded for my life.”
verses.ar: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي

verses.en: On that Day, none will punish as He punishes.
verses.ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ

verses.en: And none will shackle as He shackles.
verses.ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ

verses.en: But as for you, O tranquil soul.
verses.ar: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ

verses.en: Return to your Lord, pleased and accepted.
verses.ar: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَرْضِيَّةً

verses.en: Enter among My worshipers.
verses.ar: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي

verses.en: Enter My Garden.
verses.ar: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: I swear by this land.
verses.ar: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ

verses.en: And you are free in this land.
verses.ar: وَأَنْتَ حِلٌّ بِهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ

verses.en: And by a father and what he fathered.
verses.ar: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ

verses.en: We created the human being in distress.
verses.ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ

verses.en: Does he think that none will ever have power over him?
verses.ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَنْ يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ

verses.en: He says, “I have squandered vast wealth.”
verses.ar: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُبَدًا

verses.en: Does he think that no one sees him?
verses.ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَنْ لَمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ

verses.en: Did We not make for him two eyes?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلْ لَهُ عَيْنَيْنِ

verses.en: And a tongue, and two lips?
verses.ar: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ

verses.en: And We guided him to the two ways?
verses.ar: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ

verses.en: But he did not brave the ascent.
verses.ar: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ

verses.en: And how would you know what the ascent is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ

verses.en: The freeing of a slave.
verses.ar: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

verses.en: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.
verses.ar: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ

verses.en: Of an orphaned relative.
verses.ar: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ

verses.en: Or a destitute in the dust.
verses.ar: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ

verses.en: Then he becomes of those who believe, and advise one another to patience, and advise one another to kindness.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ

verses.en: These are the people of happiness.
verses.ar: أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ

verses.en: But as for those who defy Our revelations—these are the people of misery.
verses.ar: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ

verses.en: Upon them is a padlocked Fire.
verses.ar: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُؤْصَدَةٌ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the sun and its brightness.
verses.ar: وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا

verses.en: And the moon as it follows it.
verses.ar: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا

verses.en: And the day as it reveals it.
verses.ar: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا

verses.en: And the night as it conceals it.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا

verses.en: And the sky, and He who built it.
verses.ar: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا

verses.en: And the earth, and He who spread it.
verses.ar: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا

verses.en: And the soul, and He who formed it.
verses.ar: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا

verses.en: And inspired it to its immoralities and its righteousness.
verses.ar: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا

verses.en: Successful is he who purifies it.
verses.ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَنْ زَكَّاهَا

verses.en: And failing is he who corrupts it.
verses.ar: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ دَسَّاهَا

verses.en: Thamood denied in its rebelliousness.
verses.ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا

verses.en: When it followed its most wretched.
verses.ar: إِذِ انْبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا

verses.en: The messenger of Allah said to them, “Allah's female camel, so let her drink.”
verses.ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا

verses.en: But they denied him, then hamstrung her. So their Lord crushed them for their sin, and He leveled it.
verses.ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا

verses.en: He does not fear its consequences.
verses.ar: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the night as it conceals.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ

verses.en: And the day as it reveals.
verses.ar: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

verses.en: And He who created the male and the female.
verses.ar: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ

verses.en: Your endeavors are diverse.
verses.ar: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ

verses.en: As for him who is charitable and righteous.
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ

verses.en: And confirms goodness.
verses.ar: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ

verses.en: We will facilitate for him the path of ease.
verses.ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

verses.en: But as for him who is stingy and indifferent.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ

verses.en: And denies goodness.
verses.ar: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ

verses.en: We will facilitate for him the path of difficulty.
verses.ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ

verses.en: And his money will not avail him when he plummets.
verses.ar: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ

verses.en: It is upon Us to guide.
verses.ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ

verses.en: And to Us belong the Last and the First.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ

verses.en: I have warned you of a Raging Fire.
verses.ar: فَأَنْذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ

verses.en: Which none will enter except the most wretched.
verses.ar: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى

verses.en: He who denies and turns away.
verses.ar: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verses.en: But the devout will avoid it.
verses.ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى

verses.en: He who gives his wealth to be purified.
verses.ar: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

verses.en: Seeking no favors in return.
verses.ar: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِنْدَهُ مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ

verses.en: Only seeking the attention of his Lord, the Most High.
verses.ar: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ

verses.en: And he will be pleased.
verses.ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the morning brightness.
verses.ar: وَالضُّحَىٰ

verses.en: And the night as it settles.
verses.ar: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

verses.en: Your Lord did not abandon you, nor is He displeased.
verses.ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

verses.en: The Hereafter is better for you than the First.
verses.ar: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ

verses.en: And your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.
verses.ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ

verses.en: Did He not find you orphaned, and He sheltered you?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ

verses.en: And found you wandering, and He guided you?
verses.ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ

verses.en: And found you in need, and He enriched you?
verses.ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ

verses.en: Therefore, do not mistreat the orphan.
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ

verses.en: Nor snub the seeker.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ

verses.en: But proclaim the blessings of your Lord.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Did We not soothe your heart for you?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ

verses.en: And lift your burden from you.
verses.ar: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنْكَ وِزْرَكَ

verses.en: Which weighed down your back?
verses.ar: الَّذِي أَنْقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ

verses.en: And We raised your reputation for you?
verses.ar: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ

verses.en: With difficulty, there is ease.
verses.ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

verses.en: With difficulty, there is ease.
verses.ar: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

verses.en: When your work is done, turn to devotion.
verses.ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانْصَبْ

verses.en: And be eager for your Lord.
verses.ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَبْ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the fig and the olive.
verses.ar: وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ

verses.en: And Mount Sinai.
verses.ar: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

verses.en: And this secure land.
verses.ar: وَهَٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ

verses.en: We created the human being in the best design.
verses.ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنْسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ

verses.en: Then We reduced him to the lowest of the low.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ

verses.en: Except those who believe and do good deeds—they will have an unending reward.
verses.ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

verses.en: So what makes you deny the religion?
verses.ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ

verses.en: Is Allah not the Wisest of Judges?
verses.ar: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Read: In the Name of your Lord, who created.
verses.ar: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ

verses.en: Created man from a clinging clot.
verses.ar: خَلَقَ الْإِنْسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ

verses.en: Read: And your Lord is the Most Generous.
verses.ar: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ

verses.en: He Who taught by the pen.
verses.ar: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ

verses.en: Taught man what he never knew.
verses.ar: عَلَّمَ الْإِنْسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ

verses.en: In fact, the human being oversteps all bounds.
verses.ar: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ

verses.en: When he considers himself exempt.
verses.ar: أَنْ رَآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ

verses.en: But to your Lord is the return.
verses.ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ

verses.en: Have you seen him who prevents?
verses.ar: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ

verses.en: A servant when he prays?
verses.ar: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ

verses.en: Do you think he is upon guidance?
verses.ar: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ

verses.en: Or advocates righteousness?
verses.ar: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ

verses.en: Did you see how he denied and turned away?
verses.ar: أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verses.en: Does he not know that Allah sees?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمْ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

verses.en: No. If he does not desist, We will drag him by the forelock.
verses.ar: كَلَّا لَئِنْ لَمْ يَنْتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ

verses.en: A lying, sinful forelock.
verses.ar: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ

verses.en: So let him call his gang.
verses.ar: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ

verses.en: We will call the Wardens.
verses.ar: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ

verses.en: No, do not obey him, but bow down, and come near.
verses.ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِبْ ۩

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: We sent it down on the Night of Destiny.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ

verses.en: But how would you know what the Night of Destiny is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ

verses.en: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months.
verses.ar: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

verses.en: In it descend the angels and the Spirit, by their Lord's permission, with every command.
verses.ar: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ مِنْ كُلِّ أَمْرٍ

verses.en: Peace it is—until the break of dawn.
verses.ar: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the Polytheists were not apart until the Clear Evidence came to them.
verses.ar: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنْفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ

verses.en: A messenger from Allah reciting purified scriptures.
verses.ar: رَسُولٌ مِنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُطَهَّرَةً

verses.en: Containing valuable writings.
verses.ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
