verses.en: Those who were given the Scripture did not splinter, until after the Clear Evidence came to them.
verses.ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ

verses.en: They were only commanded to worship Allah, devoting their faith to Him alone, and to practice regular prayer, and to give the purifying charity—that is the upright religion.
verses.ar: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ

verses.en: Those who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture and the Polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, remaining in it forever. These are the worst of creatures.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ

verses.en: As for those who believe and do good works—these are the best of creatures.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ

verses.en: Their reward is with their Lord: Gardens of Eden beneath which rivers flow, remaining in them forever. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. That is for whoever fears His Lord.
verses.ar: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: When the earth is shaken with its quake.
verses.ar: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

verses.en: And the earth brings out its loads.
verses.ar: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا

verses.en: And the human being says, “What is the matter with it?”
verses.ar: وَقَالَ الْإِنْسَانُ مَا لَهَا

verses.en: On that Day, it will convey its chronicles.
verses.ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا

verses.en: Because your Lord will have inspired it.
verses.ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا

verses.en: On that Day, the people will emerge in droves, to be shown their works.
verses.ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ

verses.en: Whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
verses.ar: فَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ

verses.en: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
verses.ar: وَمَنْ يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By the panting chargers.
verses.ar: وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا

verses.en: By the igniters of sparks.
verses.ar: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا

verses.en: By the raiders at dawn.
verses.ar: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا

verses.en: Raising clouds of dust.
verses.ar: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا

verses.en: Storming into the midst.
verses.ar: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا

verses.en: The human being is ungrateful to his Lord.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ

verses.en: And he bears witness to that.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ

verses.en: And he is fierce in his love of good things.
verses.ar: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

verses.en: Does he not know? When the graves’ contents are scattered around.
verses.ar: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ

verses.en: And the hearts’ contents are retrieved.
verses.ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ

verses.en: On that Day, their Lord is fully informed of them.
verses.ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُمْ بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَخَبِيرٌ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: The Shocker.
verses.ar: الْقَارِعَةُ

verses.en: What is the Shocker?
verses.ar: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ

verses.en: And how would you know what the Shocker is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ

verses.en: The Day when people will be like scattered moths.
verses.ar: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ

verses.en: And the mountains will be like fluffed up wool.
verses.ar: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنْفُوشِ

verses.en: As for he whose scales are heavy.
verses.ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ

verses.en: He will be in a pleasant life.
verses.ar: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَاضِيَةٍ

verses.en: But as for he whose scales are light.
verses.ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ

verses.en: His home is the Abyss.
verses.ar: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what it is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ

verses.en: A Raging Fire.
verses.ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Vying for increase distracts you.
verses.ar: أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ

verses.en: Until you visit the graveyards.
verses.ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ

verses.en: No indeed, you will know.
verses.ar: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: Again: No indeed, you will know.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

verses.en: No indeed, If you knew with the knowledge of certainty.
verses.ar: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ

verses.en: You would see the Inferno.
verses.ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ

verses.en: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ

verses.en: Then, on that Day, you will be questioned about the pleasures.
verses.ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: By Time.
verses.ar: وَالْعَصْرِ

verses.en: The human being is in loss.
verses.ar: إِنَّ الْإِنْسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ

verses.en: Except those who believe, and do good works, and recommend truth, and recommend patience.
verses.ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Woe to every slandering backbiter.
verses.ar: وَيْلٌ لِكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُمَزَةٍ

verses.en: Who amasses wealth and counts it over.
verses.ar: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ

verses.en: Thinking that his wealth has eternalized him.
verses.ar: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ

verses.en: By no means. He will be thrown into the Crusher.
verses.ar: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنْبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ

verses.en: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?
verses.ar: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ

verses.en: Allah's kindled Fire.
verses.ar: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ

verses.en: That laps to the hearts.
verses.ar: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ

verses.en: It closes in on them.
verses.ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِمْ مُؤْصَدَةٌ

verses.en: In extended columns.
verses.ar: فِي عَمَدٍ مُمَدَّدَةٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the masters of the elephant?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ

verses.en: Did He not make their plan go wrong?
verses.ar: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ

verses.en: And sent against them flocks of birds.
verses.ar: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ

verses.en: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
verses.ar: تَرْمِيهِمْ بِحِجَارَةٍ مِنْ سِجِّيلٍ

verses.en: Leaving them like chewed-up leaves.
verses.ar: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَأْكُولٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: For the security of Quraish.
verses.ar: لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ

verses.en: Their security during winter and summer journeys.
verses.ar: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ

verses.en: Let them worship the Lord of this House.
verses.ar: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَٰذَا الْبَيْتِ

verses.en: Who has fed them against hunger, and secured them against fear.
verses.ar: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Have you considered him who denies the religion?
verses.ar: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ

verses.en: It is he who pushes the orphan away.
verses.ar: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ

verses.en: And does not urge the feeding of the poor.
verses.ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ

verses.en: So woe to those who pray.
verses.ar: فَوَيْلٌ لِلْمُصَلِّينَ

verses.en: Those who are heedless of their prayers.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ

verses.en: Those who put on the appearance.
verses.ar: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ

verses.en: And refuse small kindnesses.
verses.ar: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: We have given you plenty.
verses.ar: إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ

verses.en: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.
verses.ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ

verses.en: He who hates you is cut off.
verses.ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Say, “O disbelievers.
verses.ar: قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ

verses.en: I do not worship what you worship.
verses.ar: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

verses.en: Nor do you worship what I worship.
verses.ar: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ

verses.en: Nor do I serve what you serve.
verses.ar: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَا عَبَدْتُمْ

verses.en: Nor do you serve what I serve.
verses.ar: وَلَا أَنْتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ

verses.en: To you your religion, and to me my religion.”
verses.ar: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: When Allah’s Victory and Conquest come.
verses.ar: إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ

verses.en: And you see the people entering Allah’s religion in crowds.
verses.ar: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا

verses.en: Then celebrate the praises of your Lord, and seek His forgiveness. He is the Acceptor of Repentance.
verses.ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Condemned are the hands of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.
verses.ar: تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ

verses.en: His wealth did not avail him, nor did what he acquired.
verses.ar: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ

verses.en: He will enter a Blazing Fire.
verses.ar: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ

verses.en: And his wife—the firewood carrier.
verses.ar: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ

verses.en: Around her neck is a rope of thorns.
verses.ar: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِنْ مَسَدٍ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Say, “He is Allah, the One.
verses.ar: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

verses.en: Allah, the Eternal.
verses.ar: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ

verses.en: He begets not, nor was He begotten.
verses.ar: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ

verses.en: And there is none comparable to Him.”
verses.ar: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of Daybreak.
verses.ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ

verses.en: From the evil of what He created.
verses.ar: مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

verses.en: And from the evil of the darkness as it gathers.
verses.ar: وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

verses.en: And from the evil of those who practice sorcery.
verses.ar: وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ

verses.en: And from the evil of an envier when he envies.”
verses.ar: وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

verses.en: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
verses.ar: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

verses.en: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind.
verses.ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ

verses.en: The King of humankind.
verses.ar: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ

verses.en: The God of humankind.
verses.ar: إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ

verses.en: From the evil of the sneaky whisperer.
verses.ar: مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ

verses.en: Who whispers into the hearts of people.
verses.ar: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ

verses.en: From among the jinn and among humankind.”
verses.ar: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
